Grab yourself a shovel or use your hands and go dig some &esand&r like a pirate to make Glass! [--给自己拿一把锹或用手来挖一些&esand&r来制作玻璃!--]

&o&dTrivia:&r&r &oDeserts aren't the world's largest sandboxes, Minecraft is! No seriously, deserts aren’t the largest, the world's largest sand deposits are actually found on the ocean floor. &r[--&o&dTrivia:&r&r &o沙漠不是世界上最大的沙子箱, Minecraft is!--]
With all your knowledge and hard work combined, you’ve achieved the ultimate goal of&c Chapter 2!&r The creation of the&2 Valve Machine! &r[--&c第2章!&r 创建&2阀门机器!&r--]
You should pat yourself in the back, you deserve it. [--你应该在背面拍拍自己,你值得的。--]
&6Now into Chapter 3!&r New challenges await you there![--&6现在进入第3章!&r新的挑战等待着你!--]
The heart of all Copper Machines! You can craft the&6 Valve Mechanism&r by using Deployers, a Mechanical Press and a Rotational Mechanism. [--所有铜制机器的核心!你可以通过使用机械手、动力冲压机和旋转机械来制作&6阀门&r.--]

The first Deployer assembles Copper Sheets into the Rotational Mechanism, then the second Deployer assembles the Glass, then the last Deployer Uses the Wrench to make sure everything is tight and finally the Mechanical Press does the final touch and you have made the &6Valve Mechanism!&r[--第一个机械手将铜板放入旋转机制,然后第二个机械手装入玻璃,然后最后一个机械手使用扳手确保所有东西都很紧,最后动力冲压机做最后的触摸,你已经制作了&6阀门机制!&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_ii_the_brass_m: Chapter III: The Precision Machine[--第三章:精密机器--]
You have Water, you have Sugar, you have Sand, you have Quartz, it’s time to mix it up! [--你有水,有糖,有沙子,有石英,是时候把它搅拌起来了!--]
Use a &6Mechanical Mixer&r and a &6Basin&r, to mix all the ingredients to get a &bSmall Certus Quartz Bud!&r God that’s a mouthful name.[--使用&6动力搅拌器&r和&6Basin&r来混合所有原料来获得&b小型赛特斯石英芽!&r神是口齿不言之名.--]
With the small version, you pour water on it using a &6Spout&r. You have to pour water 3 times on the &bSmall Certus Quartz Bud.&r[--有了小版本,你就会用&6蒸馏&r向它倒水.你必须在&b小型赛特斯石英芽&r上倒3次水.&r--]
With the medium version, you pour water on it using a &6Spout.&r You have to pour water 3 times on the &bMedium Certus Quartz.&r[--有了中级版本,你就会用&6蒸馏&r将水倒在上面,你必须在&b中赛特斯石英&r上倒3次--]
With the large version, you pour water on it using a &6Spout.&r You have to pour water 3 times on the &bLarge Certus Quartz.&r[--有了大版本,你就会用&6蒸馏&r将水倒在上面,你必须在&b大赛特斯石英&r上倒3次--]
With the Certus Quartz Cluster, you don’t pour water on it, this time you crush it either using the &6Crushing Wheels&r or the &6Millstone.&r[--使用赛特斯石英簇,你不会给它倒水,这次你使用&6粉碎轮&r或&6石膏&r粉碎它--]
Pour Destabilized Redstone with a Spout onto a Certus Quartz Crystal 3 times to turn it into a Rose Quartz.[--将石英石英粉碎成玫瑰石英,将石英注入赛特斯石英水晶3次。--]
With the Redstone Dust and Nether Wart you’ve collected. Put them inside a basing on top of a Blaze Burner and mix them up with a Mechanical Mixer.[--用你收集的红石粉和下界疣。把它们放入烈焰人燃烧室顶部的基座中,然后用动力搅拌器将它们搅拌。--]
You can find &4redstone&r by mining deep in the earth.[--你可以通过在大地深处挖矿来找到&4红石&r.--]
There are recipes to automate the process of getting &4Redstone Dust&r. By washing Crushed Raw Iron.[--有配方可以自动化获得&4红石粉&r.通过洗涤粉碎原铁.--]
Here’s a trivia for you for a start![--这是你的一个开始!--]
Sugar can save your life! When poured in a wound, the sugar granules will soak up the moisture that allows the bacteria to thrive. [--糖可以让你活命!当糖粒被倒入一个外壳时,糖粒会浸润出允许细菌生长的湿度.--]
Without the bacteria, the wound heals more. In some parts of the world, this procedure can save the lives of people who cannot afford antibiotics.[--没有菌丝,伤害会治愈更多。在世界上的某些地方,这个程序可以拯救无法承受抗生素的人的生命。--]
Now for game facts, you can get&6 sugar&r by cultivating&a Sugar Canes&r or some honey from the bees.[--现在对于游戏现实,你可以通过种植&a甘蔗&r或蜜蜂获得&6甘蔗&r.--]
The famous &bWater Bucket!&r It can save your life! [--命名的&b水桶!&r它可以救命!--]
Always carry a &bWater bucket&r with you so when you jump from a high place, if you time it well, you can place the Water to dampen your fall. [--总是随身携带一个&b水桶&r,所以当你从高处跳跃时,如果你时间好,你可以放置水来抑制摔落.--]
That’s your Pro tip for the day![--这是你一天的工作提示!--]
&aNote:&r &oYou probably already know how to get a Water Bucket by now.&r[--&a注意:&r&o你现在可能已经知道如何得到水桶了.&r--]
You probably already know how to get some Sand by now.[--你可能已经知道如何得到一些沙子了。--]

Time to assemble! You have two ways to do this, you can either use a Deployer holding a &6Polished Quartz Rose&r and place it into an Iron Sheet or you can use Mechanical Crafts for something more fancy looking.[--是时候组装了!你有两个方法可以做这个,你可以使用手持&6磨制石英玫瑰&r并将其放入铁薄板中,也可以使用动力合成来达到更精致的外观。--]

With the Soul Sand in hand, you can now wash it’s sins by using a&6 Encased Fan&r and Water blowing against the Soul Sand and you’ll get&c Nether Quartz&r in return as well a chance of getting a Gold Nugget.[--手持灵魂沙后,你现在可以通过使用&6灌注风扇&r和水对着灵魂沙吹灭来洗净它的邪恶,你将获得&c下界石英&r以及获得金粒的几率.--]
You can also mine &cNether Quartz&r in the Nether.[--你也可以在下界开采&c下界石英&r.--]

Time to polish the &cRose Quartz.&r To do so you have to use&6 Sand Paper&r, you can either do it by hand or with a Deployer in an automated way. [--是时候给&c甘蔗石英&r磨粉了。&r要这样做,你必须使用&6砂纸&r,你可以手动或用机械手自动完成.--]
There are various types of &6Sand Paper&r with different durability.[--有各种&6沙子&r的耐久性不同.--]
&6&lTip:&r&r &oYou can use a Seething Sail as a permanent solution for your polishing automations.&r[--&6&l提p:&r&r &o你可以使用幻影风帆作为打磨自动化的永久解决方案.&r--]

To get Brass Ingots you have to mix both&6 Zinc Ingots&r and &6Copper Ingots&r. To do so you need a Basin on top of a Blaze Burner and a Mechanical Mixer.[--要获得黄铜锭,你必须同时混合&6锌锭&r和&6铜锭&r。要这样做,你需要在烈焰人燃烧室和动力搅拌器上有一个盆子。--]
You probably already know how to get some&d copper ingots&r by now.[--你可能已经知道如何得到一些&d铜锭&r了.--]
You can get&9 Raw Zinc&r from mining and to turn it into an ingot you have to smelter it. [--你可以从采矿中获得&9原锌&r,然后把它变成一个你必须冶炼它的锭.--]
You can use an Encased Fan and Lava for an automated process or use a Seething Sail with an Encased Fan.[--你可以使用灌注风扇和熔岩来自动处理,也可以使用灌注风扇的注星帆。--]
Please check &nRenewable Ores chapter&r for information on how to get a renewable source of &9Raw Zinc&r.[--请查看&n可更新矿石章节&r了解如何获得&9Raw Zinc&r的再生源头.--]
Grab your Brass Ingots, place it under a Mechanical Press and start flat lining them to make some Brass Sheets.[--抓住黄铜锭,将其放在动力冲压机下,开始平整内衬,制作一些黄铜片。--]

The &cNether Wart&r can be found in the Nether or you can farm like you farm wheat. Instead of dirt you need to plant the &cNether Wart&r in &6Soul Sand&r and the &rNether Wart&r doesn’t need light to grow.[--&c下界疣&r可以在下界找到,或者你可以像种植小麦一样耕种。你需要泥土而不是在&6灵魂沙&r中种植&c下界疣&r,而&r下界疣&r不需要光来生长.--]
With the Soulless Sand you’ve just made, grab yourself a Soul from the shelf and stick it up the Soulless Sand! [--用你刚刚制作的没有灵魂的沙子,从书架里捡一个灵魂,把它粘在没有灵魂的沙子上!--]

To create&6 Soul Sand&r you must use a &cDeployer&r to put a &3Soul Bead&r or&3 Ethereal Spirit&r  into the Soulless Sand, turning it into Soul Sand.[--要创建&6灵魂沙&r,你必须使用&c动力棒&r将&3灵魂珠&r或&3虚弱之魂&r放入灵魂沙中,将其变成灵魂沙.--]
The Soul Bead drops from Wraiths. The Wraiths can be found wandering around in the Nether in the Soul Sand Valleys.[--灵魂珠从幽灵中掉落。幽灵可以在灵魂沙峡谷的下界游荡。--]
&l&2Note:&r&r &oIn the next chapter you’ll learn how to automate monster drops.&r[--&l&2注意:&r&r&o在下章节中你会学习如何使怪物掉落物自动化.&r--]
Sand without a Soul, which begs the question, does Sand contain a Soul? Spoiler alert! It does, in the Nether. [--没有灵魂的沙子,它会请求问题,沙子是否包含灵魂?沙子会警告你吗?在下界!--]
To obtain the Soulless Sand you have to curse the Sand, not verbally though, you use a &bhaunted flame&r. [--要获得没有灵魂的沙子,你必须诅咒沙子,而不是言语,你使用了&b恶魂火焰&r.--]

You can use a Soul Campfire or set a Soul Sand on fire with a Flint and Stone or use a Haunting Sail, with an Encased Fan blowing air against a Sand block which will turn it into a Soulless Sand.[--你可以使用灵魂营火或用石和石来点燃灵魂沙,也可以用鼓风机对着沙子吹气,将其变成灵魂沙子。--]
The Ethereal Spirit drops from a variety of monsters that lurk during the night that spawn randomly around the world or structures. [--天域灵灵从各种怪物身上掉落,这些怪物在夜间潜行,随机生成于世界或结构。--]
&l&2Note:&r&r &oIn the next chapter you’ll learn how to automate monster drops.&r[--&l&2注意:&r&r&o在下章节中你会学习如何使怪物掉落物自动化.&r--]
The heart of all &6Brass Machines!&r [--所有&6黄铜机器的心脏!&r--]
You can craft the &aPrecision Mechanism&r by using Deployers, a Mechanical Press and a Valve Mechanism. [--你可以使用机械手、动力冲压机和阀门机来制作&a精密装置&r.--]

The first Deployer assembles Brass Sheets into the Valve Mechanism, then the second Deployer assembles the Electron Tube, then the last Deployer assembles the Cog Wheel and finally the Mechanical Press does the final touch and you have made the &6Precision Mechanism!&r[--第一个机械手将黄铜片装入阀门,然后第二个机械手装入电子管,然后最后一个机械手组装齿轮,最后动力冲压机做最后的触摸,你已经制作了&6精密装置!&r--]
&aNote:&r &oIt has a 85% success rate and a 15% chance of giving a random item.[--&a注意:&r&o它有85%的成败率和15%的几率随机给予物品.--]
Remember when you flattened the Copper Ingots? Well do the same for the Iron.[--记得你平整铜锭的时候吗?对铁也这样。--]
Use a &6Mechanical Press&r to flatten the Iron Ingots into Iron Sheets.[--使用&6动力冲压机&r将铁锭平整成铁片.--]
With all your knowledge and hard work combined, you’ve achieved the ultimate goal of&c Chapter 3!&r The creation of the &aPrecision Machine!&r[--&c第3章!&r 创建&a精密机器!&r--]
This will evolve your automation farms to a whole new level of automation and precision! You should pat yourself in the back, you deserve it. [--这将将你的自动化农场升级到新的自动化和精准水平!你应该给自己拍拍背,你值得它。--]

Congratulations on getting this far,you’ve mastered the basics of Create, you know how to use the JEI  function so from now on &9you’re on your own! &r[--恭喜你到了这个地步,你已经掌握了创造的基础,你知道如何使用JEI功能,从现在起,&9你只能自己了!&r--]

The challenges that await you on &lChapter 4 and beyond are harder&r than what you had to do so far but don’t lose hope! I know you can master all chapters, believe in me (the writer) as I believe in you! [--在&l第4章和以后等待你的挑战比之前你必须做的更难&r,但不要失去希望!我知道,你可以掌握所有章节,信我(作者),因为我相信你!--]

I know you’ll miss me, but don’t worry! I’ll still be here to help you with certain mechanics in the next chapters but mostly you’re on your own. Good luck![--我知道你会想我的,但不要操心!我还是会在这里帮助你在下一个章节里处理某些机械师,但大多数情况下你都是你自己的。祝好运!--]
&6&lTip:&r&r &oIf you feel like you’re running out of certain materials, make sure to check the Chapter Renewable Ores.&r[--&6&l提p:&r&r&o如果你觉得你正在消耗某些材料,请确保查看可更新矿石章节.&r--]
&6Tom's Simple Storage[--&6Tom的简单存储--]

Do you end up with a gazillion chests and not know which chest you put the item that you need for your next build? Then you’ll love this &6Tom's Simple Storage&r, as it makes storing and finding your items much easier![--你是否拿着一个gazillion箱子,不知道你把下一个建造所需的物品放在哪个箱子里?然后你会喜欢这个&6Tom的简单存储&r,因为它让你的物品更容易存储和找到!--]
&nHow it works:&r[--&n如何工作:&r--]

&2Step 1:&r  First, you place down a block called the Inventory Connector. This is like a better brain than yours. It knows where everything is kept. Then you either place a Storage Terminal or a Crafting Terminal on the Inventory Connector to access the chests contents. Make sure to use Shift when doing so.[--&2第1步:&r首先,你放下一个叫“物品栏连接器”的方块。这就像一个比你的更好的大脑。它知道所有东西都保留在哪里。然后,你在物品栏连接器上放一个存储终端或合成终端以访问箱子内容。确保这样做时使用Shift。--]

&2Step 2:&r You can place a chest on either side of the Inventory Connector and it will read its contents. You can even stack the chests on top of each other and the Inventory Connector will still read their contents as long as one chest is touching the Inventory Connector.[--&2第2步:&r你可以在物品栏连接器的两侧放置一个箱子,它会读取其中的内容。你甚至可以将箱子堆叠在彼此的顶部,只要一个箱子触摸到物品栏连接器,物品栏连接器仍然会读取它们的内容.--]

&2Step 3:&r If you have Chests that are in a further location, you can use an item called Inventory Cable Connector against the chest, make sure to use Shift to do so and then you use another item called Inventory Cable to make a connection from the Cable Connector to the Inventory Connector to read the chests contents even though it’s further away.[--&2第3步:&r如果你有箱子在另一个地方,你可以对箱子使用一个叫做库存线缆连接器的物品,确保使用Shift来这样做,然后使用另一个叫做库存线缆的物品从线缆连接器连接器到存储连接器来读取箱子内容,即使它距离更远.--]
Note: It also works with Item Vaults[--注意:它也适用于物品保险库--]
That’s just the basics on how this mod works. It has many more features for you to discover![--这只是这个mod如何工作的基础。它有更多的功能需要你发现!--]

You know how to craft one… Fine… For consistency's sake… Grab a Shaft, grab a Wood Plank and either use a Deployer to place the Wood Plank on a Shaft, or a Mechanical Mixer with a Basin to mix both or use the trusty Crafting Table to make the Cog Wheel. [--你知道如何制作一个... 好吧...为了untlearnity's...craft a shift,抓一个木板,然后使用机械手将木板放在传动杆上,或者使用动力搅拌机将两个混合,或者使用信任工作台来制作齿轮.--]

&cBuilding Gadgets&r mod allows you to create some cool gadgets to help you build big bases, or for clearing out large areas using the &dDestruction Gadget.&r[--&c建筑小帮手&rmod允许你制作一些很酷的小帮手来帮助你建造大基座,或者使用&d破坏小帮手来清除大区域.&r--]
&6&lNote:&r&r &oTo charge this Gadget you must use a Tesla Coil and have eletricity. &r[--&6&lNote:&r&r&o为这个小帮手充电,你必须使用Tesla线圈并具有电子化.&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_iv_the_locomot: Chapter IV: The Locomotive Machine[--第四章:机车机器--]
&9Mob Predictions &rwill need to be processed in a &2loot fabricator&r, a device which uses power to convert predictions to mob drops.[--&9怪物推测&r需要在&2豪布置器&r中处理,该设备使用电力将预言转化为生物掉落物.--]
The drops which are available are based on a list of pre-defined items, and a target can be selected for each type of model. [--可用的掉落物基于一个预定义的物品列表,可以为每种模型选择一个目标。--]
&2The loot fabricator&r will remember your choices for each type, so you can feed multiple types of predictions into a single fabricator.[--&2战利品制造器&r会记住你对每种类型的选择,这样你就可以将多种预言喂给单个制造器.--]
Training a Data Model can be done in one of two ways, with a &4Deep Learner&r or with a &6Simulation Chamber&r. [--使用&4深度学习器&r或&6模拟室&r可以两种方式之一进行数据模型训练.--]
All models start out in the Faulty state, and must be trained up to Basic in the deep learner.[--所有模型都是从错误状态开始的,必须在深处学习者中接受基础训练。--]
Once your model is Basic or higher, you can use the simulation chamber to run simulations of your model. [--一旦你的模型是基础或更高的,你就可以使用模拟室来运行模型的模拟。--]
Simulations will always produce a generalized prediction, and may also produce a Mob Prediction, based on the accuracy of the model.[--模拟将始终产生一个通用的预测,并且根据模型的精准度也可以产生一个怪物预测。--]

The higher tier of the model, the higher the accuracy, up to 99.5% at Self Aware. Running simulations requires energy (based on the model type) and a catalyst item, which is usually a &6Prediction Matrix&r.[--模型的等级越高,精准度就越高,自觉时达到99.5%。运行模拟需要能量(基于模型类型)和一个催化剂物品,通常是一个&6预设矩阵&r.--]
&2Hostile Neural Networks&r is a mod based on Deep Mob Learning.[--&2主心网络&r是一个基于深渊怪物学习的mod.--]
It allows you to train data models and run simulations, producing mob predictions, which can be used to generate mob loot.[--它允许你训练数据模型和运行模拟,产生生物预测,可用于生成生物战利品。--]

The fundamental unit of this mod is the &dData Model&r - an item which holds information about an entity that you can utilize to generate their drops. [--这个mod的基本单元是&d数据模型&r - 存储一个实体的信息,你可以使用它来产生掉落物.--]
To get a Data Model, you must first craft a &6Data Model Framework&r, and use it on the target entity to build the model. [--要获得数据模型,你必须先制作一个&6数据模型框架&r,然后在目标实体上使用它来建造模型.--]
Once you have your model, you will have to train it.[--一旦你有了你的模型,你必须训练它。--]
&0Ferrous Slime&r can be found in &9Magnetic Alex Caves&r.[--&0火灵史莱姆&r可以在&9磁力亚历克斯洞穴&r中找到.--]
Once you get there you need collect a data model of Ferrous Slime and train it to Basic.[--一旦你到达那里,你需要收集铁史莱姆的数据模型并将其训练到基础。--]
Put the liquid concrete in a framework block and wait a few seconds till it forms a solid block of concetre. [--将液态混凝土放入框架方块中,再等几秒它就会变成一个坚固的沉浸方块。--]
&6The deep learner&r allows you to store a few data models within, and kills you receive will begin to train the model. [--&6深渊学习者&r允许你在内部存储一些数据模型,杀死你将开始训练模型.--]
You can equip in curious or have in inventory it will work.[--你可以在奇点里装备,或者在物品栏里有它会工作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_ix_calculation: Chapter IX: Calculation Mechanism[--第九章:计算机制--]
use a beacon to convert it[--使用信标来转换它--]

To create an &6Arcane Crystal Obelisk&r, place down an &2Arcane Polished Darkstone block&r, then place two &2Arcane Crystal Blocks&r on top of it.[--要制作一个&6奥术水晶方尖碑&r,请放置一个&2奥术磨制暗黑石块&r,然后将两个&2奥术水晶块&r放在它上方.--]
Right-click with &4Mundabitur Dust&r and you'll create the obelisk.[--用&4Mundabitur粉&r右键单击,你就会制作方尖碑.--]
You already know how to make sulfur don't you?[--你已经知道如何制作硫了,不是吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_i_the_andesite: Chapter I: The Foundation of Machines[--第一章:机器的基础--]
Tree Farm[--树场--]
Begin your journey by harvesting the essence of nature: Trees.[--通过收获自然的精华开始你的旅程:树。--]
Go punch some trees to gather wood logs or you can have my axe! If I had an axe to give… [--去击打一些树来收集原木或你可以拿着我的斧子!--]
Eventually you can make an automated Tree Farm. [--最后,你可以制作一个自动化的树场。--]
Make sure to gather the Saplings to replant the trees to ensure a renewable source of wood.[--一定要收集树苗来重新种植树,确保木材的再生来源。--]
Log Harvest[--原木收割--]
Now that you have punched a tree or cut down a tree with an axe, with the logs you have harvested, you can make all sorts of wood creations![--现在你用斧头击杀一棵树或砍倒一棵树了,用你收获的原木,你可以制作各种木材!--]
Always make sure to plant the saplings again to harvest more logs after.[--始终确保再次种植树苗,然后收获更多的原木。--]
&l&6Tip:&r&r &oYou can use a Mechanical Saw and a Hand Crank to cut down trees faster.&r[--&l&6提p:&r&r &o你可以使用动力锯和手柄来更快砍树.&r--]
Sawmill Processing[--锯木机处理--]
Time to strip some logs! You can strip them by using an axe or using the &6Mechanical Saw&r, which can be used to automate the process later.[--是时候去皮一些原木了!你可以通过使用斧子或&6动力锯&r来去皮它们,这些锯可用于稍后自动化.--]
Plank Production[--木板生产--]
With the striped logs, you can convert them into planks using a&6 Crafting Table&r or a &6Mechanical Saw&r.[--用条纹原木,你可以使用&6工作台&r或&6动力锯&r将其转化为木板.--]
Slab Crafting[--台阶合成--]
With your planks in hands, you can now refine them further into Wooden Slabs. They offer a variety of crafting and building uses. [--手持木板后,你现在可以进一步将其精炼成木台阶。它们提供了各种制作和建造用途。--]
Lava Collection[--熔岩收集--]
&cThis Lava is hot!&r Lava can be used for many things, such as creating &6Cobblestone&r by touching it with water![--&c这个熔岩很热!&r熔岩可以用来做许多事情,例如用水来制作&6圆石&r!--]
Touching in the wrong order can create Obsidian instead.[--使用错误的顺序可以创建黑石。--]
&l&6Tip:&r&r &oYou can generate lava by using Drip Stones and a Cauldron.&r[--&l&6提p:&r&r&o你可以使用滴水石和炼药锅来产生熔岩.&r--]
Water Gathering[--收集水--]
&bWater is not hot!&r Shocking I know… Water can be used for many things, such as creating &6Cobblestone&r by having Lava touch the water. [--&b水不是热的!&r震荡的我知道...水可以用来做许多事情,例如通过让岩浆接触水来制造&6圆石&r.--]
If the Water touches the lava first, it will turn into Obsidian instead of Cobblestone.[--如果水先接触熔岩,它就会变成黑石而不是圆石。--]
&l&6Tip:&r&r &oYou can have an infinite water source by creating a 4 square hole and filling it with water.&r[--&l&6提p:&r&r&o您可以通过创建一个4个方形洞并用水填满它来拥有无限水源.&r--]
Cobblestone Generation[--圆石生成--]
Now that you have combined the forces of &bWater&r and &cLava&r or mined some &6Cobblestone&r. [--现在你已经结合了&b水&r和&c拉瓦&r的力量,或开采一些&6圆石&r.--]
&6Cobblestone&r can be used for many things, such as upgrading your starter wooden house or your starter dirt house… no judging. [--&6圆石&r可以用来做许多事情,例如升级你的初学者木屋或初学者泥土屋...没有决定.--]
Gravel Production[--砂砾生产--]

With all the Cobblestone you’ve harvested, it’s time to make that annoying block that tells you “YOU SHALL NOT PASS!” if it doesn’t suffocate you first by falling on top of you. [--有了你收获的所有圆石,是时候制作这个烦人的方块了,它告诉你:如果它不会因为掉在你的上方而窒息你!--]
You can make the Gravel by using a&6 Millingstone&r or &8Crushing Wheels&r.[--你可以使用&6磨石&r或&8粉碎轮&r来制作砂砾.--]
Andesite Production[--安山生产--]
Now that you have Gravel, you can use an &6Encased Fan&r with a heat source, like a &cCampfire&r, to turn Gravel into Andesite. [--现在你有了沙砾,你可以使用&6装箱的风扇&r来把沙砾变成安山岩.--]
Don’t use Lava as your heat source though, it will destroy the Gravel.[--不要用熔岩作为你的热源,它会摧毁砂砾.--]
&l&6Tip:&r&r &oYou can use a Netherrack and set it on fire with Flint and Steel, for something more fancy than a Campfire..&r[--&l&6提p:&r&r &o你可以使用下界岩用石和钢来点燃它,为了比营火更棒的东西.&r--]
Andesite Alloy Mixing[--安山合金混合物--]
With all the Andesite you’ve gathered, it’s time to turn into Andesite Alloy! [--有了你收集的所有安山岩,是时候变成安山合金了!--]

One of the most important materials of the &6Create Mod&r. To do so you can either use a &6Crafting Table&r or use a &6Mechanical Mixer&r for a more material efficient way.[--&6合成模组&r最重要的材料之一。要这样做,你可以使用&6合成台&r或使用&6动力搅拌器&r来提高材料的效率.--]
Building the Rotation Mechanism[--建造旋转机制--]
The heart of all Andesite Machines![--所有安山机器的核心!--]
You can craft &aRotational Mechanism&r by using Mjöln-I mean the Hammer; Andesite Alloy; a Wooden Slab and some Iron ingots in a Crafting Table. [--您可以通过使用Mjöln-I 意指锤子;安山合金;木台阶和一些铁锭来制作&a旋转机械&r.--]
Automating the crafting of the Rotational Mechanism &6using sequence assembly makes it more resource efficient.&r[--自动化旋转机制的制作&6使用序列组装可以提高资源效率.&r--]
Hammer Acquisition[--锤子获取--]

Time to summon Mjölnir! You wish I know but you can craft the&6 Hammer&r using a &bCrafting Table&r or a &bMechanical Crafter&r for an automated supply of Hammers. [--是时候召唤Mjölnir了!你希望我知道,但你可以使用&b合成台&r或&b机械合成器&r来制作&6锤子&r来自动提供锤子.--]
The Hammers have 64 uses until it breaks.[--锤子有64个用途,直到它破坏。--]

&o&cRumor:&r&r &oI’ve heard that you can turn the Hammer into an unbreakable Hammer just like Mjölnir! Not the Marvel one though, that one still breaks.&r[--&o&c符文:&r&r&o我听说过,你可以把锤子变成一个坚不可摧的锤子,就像Mjolnir一样!不是大理石,那一个还是可以破坏的.&r--]
The Andesite Machine[--安山机器--]
With all your knowledge and hard work combined, you’ve achieved the ultimate goal of&c Chapter 1!&r The creation of the &aRotation Machine!&r[--用你的所有知识与辛劳工作结合,你已经实现&c第1章!&r创建&a旋转机器!&r--]
You should pat yourself in the back, you deserve it.[--你应该在背面拍拍自己,你值得的。--]
Now into &6Chapter 2!&r New challenges await you there.[--现在进入&6第2章!&r新的挑战等待着你。--]
Lets get started![--让我们开始吧!--]

The start might be hard because there aren't many materials and machines, but keep going—your hard work will pay off. Remember, exploring is important.[--开始可能很困难,因为没有太多的材料和机器,但请继续,你的辛劳工作会很有用。记住,探索很重要。--]

At start you will have to make some manual work. It's more expensive to craft &6Rotation Mechanism&r at crafting table so as soon you can automate it.[--首先,你必须做一些手动工作。在工作台制作&6旋转机制&r会更贵,这样你就可以立即自动化了.--]
As you progress further into chapters of this modpack, It'll become quite challenging if you don't automate things.[--当你进一步进入这个modpack的章节时,如果你不自动化东西,它就会变得非常具有挑战性。--]
Tip: If you find a way to make something be automated, you should do it.[--提示:如果你找到自动化东西的方法,你应该这样做。--]
Let's go on an adventure and build some amazing machines![--让我们去冒险,建造一些神奇的机器!--]
&a&lUnlock&r&r[--&a&l解锁&r&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_vii_building_a: Chapter VIII: Building The Rocket[--第八章:建造火箭--]
Craft a rocket nose cone.[--制作一个火箭鼻锥。--]
Let's get the basic parts ready to head to space.[--让我们准备好前往太空的基础部件。--]
We are going to the moon!!![--我们正在前往月球!!!--]
Space Engineers[--太空工程师--]

You should bring multiple &ffull oxygen tanks&r, plentiful &ffood&r, &csoul torches&r or &eglowstone&r, &aweapons&r and &atools&r. Once you have this, you are ready to launch! Enter the &erocket&r and press &aSpace&r!&r[--您应该带多个&f富集氧气储罐&r,富集&f食物&r,&c灵魂火把&r或&e灰色石&r,&a武器&r和&a工具&r。 一旦你有了这个,您就准备发射!进入&erocket&r并按&aSpace&r!&r--]
Crouch and right click to pen its UI.[--潜行右键以切换UI.--]
From there, &6Astral Fuel&r can be deposited.[--从那里可以储存&6星辉燃料&r.--]
It can store up to three buckets, its a smart ideia to keep some spare. Being stranded is the worst thing that can happen yo you.[--它最多可以存储3桶,它是一个保存一些多余的智能ideia。被抛锚是你可能发生的最糟糕的事。--]

Right-click to enter the rocket. Adter holding space for awhile you'll launch off and gain acess to a planetary selection system. You can't expore every planet just yet, but you'll still have some new options.[--右键单击以进入火箭。Adter hand space for a while you'll smod off and get access to a speat schement system.你还不能探索每个星球,但你仍然有一些新的选项.--]
After selecting a location, you'll descend on the planet in a lander.[--在选择一个位置后,你将在着陆器中掉落到星球上。--]

Space will decelerate it. Make sure you do not hit the ground too fast: the lander will explode and you'll be left with no way home. The truly paranoind will take two rockets. F5 can help with the landing process.[--太空会减速。确保你不会太快地击中地面:着陆器会爆炸,你将无法回家。真正的parnoind将使用两枚火箭。F5可以帮助着陆过程。--]
A Rocket needs something to launch off of, so we'll need to make a &aLaunch Pad&r.[--火箭需要一些东西才能发射,所以我们需要制作一个&aLawnch Pad&r.--]

To use it, place it down wherever you want to launch from with a clear view of the sky. Once you have a Rocket, you can place it down in the middle of the Launch Pad.[--要使用它,请将其放置在你想从的地方发射的天空中。当你有火箭时,你可以将其放置在发射台中间。--]
&aSuiting Up&r[--&a套装&r--]
If you're planning on going to space, you better believe that you need a new set of gear for the journey.[--如果你计划前往太空,你最好相信,你需要一套新的装备来进行旅行。--]

You'll need to make a full &aSpace Suit&r for your first trip, which will be to the &bMoon&r. Come to find out, the Moon is kind of cold and lacks Oxygen. Without a Suit, you won't last long. :)[--你需要为你的第一次旅行制作一个完整的&a太空服&r,这将是前往&b月&r。来了解一下,月球有点冷,缺少氧气。没有套装,你不会持续很久。:)--]
&aPreparing Some&r &bOxygen&r[--&a准备一些&r&b氧气&r--]

Fun Fact: You cannot breathe on the Moon without &bOxygen&r. Actually, you can't breathe anywhere without Oxygen. Guess what the Moon doesn't have?[--有趣现实:没有&b氧气&r,你无法在月球上呼吸。 实际上,没有氧气,你无法在任何地方呼吸。你猜月球没有什么?--]

So we're going to make us some. Start by crafting an &aOxygen Loader&r and giving it water and power. This will begin to convert the Water into &bOxygen&r for us to use.[--因此,我们将做一些。从制作&a氧气装载器&r开始,并为它提供水和电力。这将开始将水转化为&b氧气&r供我们使用.--]
To collect it, you can either place an &bOxygen Tank&r, an empty bucket, or a Space Suit inside.[--要收集它,你可以把&b氧气储罐&r、空桶或太空服放进去.--]
Pro Tip: It's always a good idea to have extra &bOxygen&r on hand... just in case.[--Pro Tip: 手持额外的&b氧气&r总是个好东西...--]
Space Stations[--空间站--]
Once you've explored the Moon and gathered enough Desh, you will be able to create &dSpace Stations&r around planets![--一旦你探索了月球并收集了足够多戴斯,你就可以在行星周围创建&d空间站&r了!--]
These are prebuilt structures that serve as a mini-base in the galaxy. Home away from home kinda thing.[--这些是预设的结构,在星系中作为微型基座。有点离家出走。--]
Oxygen for your Bases![--基础氧气!--]
If you want to make a base outside of the Earth, you'll most likely need a way to get &bOxygen&r.[--如果你想在土外建造一个基座,你最需要一种获得&b氧气&r的方法。--]

The &dOxygen Distributor&r is a machine that distributes oxygen in a &asealed&r room. When given water and power, it will automatically distribute the oxygen into the sealed room.[--&d氧气分配器&r是一种在&asealed&r室中分配氧气的机器。当给它水和电力时,它会自动将氧气分配到密封室.--]

The &9Water Pump&r is used to pump water from an infinite water source below it into the Distributor. You can also pump water in using a sink or an &dEternal Water Block&r.[--&9水泵&r用于从它下方的无限水源中泵水到分配器中。你也可以使用水槽或&d永恒水块&r泵水.--]
Craft a &2Solar Panel[--制作一个&2太阳能板--]

Its power generation depends on the planet's distance from the &csun &6and &bfog&r. Because of this, it is more efficient to place &bsolar panels&r close to the &csun&r. &bsolar panels&r also produce more energy in &borbit&r, as there is no &catmosphere&r blocking the &dlight&r.&r[--它的发电取决于行星与&c阳光&6和&bfog&r的距离。因此,在&c阳光&r附近放置&b太阳能电池板&r更高效。&b太阳能电池板&r也会在&b轨道&r中产生更多的能量,因为没有&c气动&r挡住&d光&r.&r--]

The &bwater pump&r is essential for keeping the &boxygen distributor&r running infinitely. To use it, place an &binfinite water source&r below, then place the &bwater pump&r above one of the water blocks, and then place the &boxygen distributor&r adjacent to it. Make sure to supply both the &bwater pump&r and the &boxygen distributor&r with sufficient &cpower&r.&r[--&b水泵&r对保持&b水管分配器&r无限运行至关紧要。要使用它,请在下方放置一个&b无限水源&r,然后将&b水泵&r放在水块上方,然后将&b水泵&r放在其附近的&b水泵&r。确保向&b水泵&r和&b箱气泵&r提供足够&c功率&r.&r--]
Craft a &bWater Pump[--制作一个&b水泵--]

The &6rover&r is a land vehicle capable of driving on the rough terrain of &emoons &6and &bplanets&r. It's &aexceptionally fast&r, has an &binventory &6capable of &astoring eight items &6and has &atwo seats &6for &cmultiple riders&r. To use it, fill the rover with &cfuel &6(&eshift-click&r and place &cfuel buckets &6in the &cleft input slot&r).&r[--&6传动器&r是一种可以在&eemoons&6&b飞机&r的粗糙地形上行走的载具.它&a非常快&r,具有&6可存储的&a8个物品&6,并且有&a两个&6可以&c多功能车&r.使用它,用&c燃料&6(&e随机单击&r并放置&c燃料桶&6在&c左键输入插槽&r)&r来填满路由.&r--]
Craft a &cRover[--制作一个&c路由器--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_vii_infernal_m: Chapter VII: Infernal Mechanism[--VII:地狱机制--]
you know how to make coal don't you? [--你知道如何制作煤,不是吗?--]
This can be found in blue skies dimension[--这可以在蓝色天空维度中找到--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_vi_rocket_fuel: Chapter VI: Rocket Fuel[--VI:火箭燃料--]
Finding the ore deposit[--找到矿石矿床--]
The &6Surface Scanner&f shows how far away an oil source is with an approximate 8-block margin of error. [--&6海晶扫描仪&f显示一个石油源距离大约8个方块的错误范围.--]
The oil source is found at the bedrock.[--石油来源在基岩上找到.--]

The &6surface scanner&f isn't very accurate, it’s recommended to do a search around the bedrock where the scanner pointed or to look in another location. Good luck[--&6地表扫描仪&f不十分精确,它建议围绕扫描仪指向的基岩进行搜索或在另一个地方查看.祝好运.--]
Please use the ponder scene to refer on how to build[--请使用思索场景来参考如何建造--]

Run an &3industrial pipe&f from the oil source at the bedrock to where you want to pump. Then place a &9pumpjack base&f on top the industrial pipe.[--从基岩的石油源中运行一个&3工业管道&f,到你想泵的地方。然后在工业管道顶部放置一个&9泵床&f.--]
If the pumpjack doesn't work, make sure EVERYTHING is glued together. [--如果泵工不起作用,确保所有东西都粘在一起.--]
After the Oil Pump machine is built and running, you may extract the oil with a &cmechanical pump&f attached to the &9pumpjack base&f.[--在油泵机器建造和运行后,您可以用&9泵基座&f的&c动力泵&f提取油。--]
Please use the ponder scene to refer on how to build[--请使用思索场景来参考如何建造--]
The next step is building the Distillation machine.[--下一阶段是建造蒸馏机。--]
this will be the fuel you use on your rocket[--这将是你在火箭上使用的燃料--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_v_steel_mechan: Chapter V: Steel Mechanism[--第五章:钢制机制--]
build a coke oven[--建造焦炉--]
Build a blast furnace[--建造一个高炉--]
Please visit the renewable ores chapter to learn how to activate this.[--请访问可更新的矿石章节来学习如何激活它。--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_xi_space_explo: WIP: Chapter XI: Space Exploration[--WIP:第XI章:太空探索--]
You'll need a LOT of &cDesh&r to make the &aTier 2 Rocket&r.[--您需要&c戴斯&r来制作&a第2级火箭&r.--]
With this rocket, you can fly all the way to &cMars&r! Just remember to stock up on extra &bOxygen&r and &eFuel&r for your flight back.[--使用这颗火箭,你可以一直飞到&c火星&r!只需记住为你的返回存储额外的&b氧气&r和&e燃料&r.--]
The next resource we'll be mining for is called &3Ostrum&r.[--我们将开采的下一个资源是&3紫金&r.--]
Ostrum is used for several new machines, as well as a new Space Suit for us to survive on hotter planets![--紫金用于几个新机器,以及新的太空服,让我们在更热的星球上生存!--]
Needing 6 buckets of &aFuel&r every time we want to travel to other planets can add up quick.[--每次前往其他星球都需要6桶&a燃料&r可以快速添加.--]

Using the &3Ostrum&r we've gathered, we can create the &dCyro Freezer&r. When given power, this machine will convert cold items like &bIce, Packed Ice, Blue Ice, or Ice Shards&r into &dCryo Fuel&r.[--使用我们收集的&3紫晶&r,我们就可以制作&d黄铜冷冻机&r。当给它供电时,这台机器会将冷却物品(如&b冰、浮冰、蓝冰或冰碎片&r)转化为&d晶质燃料&r.--]
Instead of needing 3 buckets per launch, you will only need 1 of &dCryo Fuel&r. That means 2 for a round-trip![--每次发射不需要3桶,你只需要1个&d有机燃料&r.这表示2个可以进行循环!--]
Note: This also freezes ice around it when placed, giving you an infinite ice source![--注意:当放置时,它也会冻结周围的冰,给你一个无限的冰源!--]
&6Oxygen Sensor&r is a machine that produces a &credstone signal&r when oxygen is detected.[--&6氧气传感器&r是一种在检测到氧气时产生&c红石信号&r的机器.--]
Craft an &bOxygen Sensor[--制作一个&b氧气传感器--]

The &6energizer&r is a machine capable of &apowering items&r and storing large amounts of &benergy&r. To &echarge an item&r, &apower the energizer&r and then right-click on the energizer with that item. It stores 2 million &benergy&r, making it capable of &ccharging machines for a very long time&r. It also retains its &benergy&r when &bbroken&r.[--&6充能器&r是一个可以&a充能物品&r并存储大量&b能量&r的机器。要&e充能物品&r,&a充能器&r然后用该物品右键单击充能器。它存储200万&b能量&r,使其能&c充电机器,持续非常长的时间&r.它也会在&b破坏&r时保留&b能量&r.--]
Craft a &4Netherite Space Helmet[--制作一个&4下界合金太空头盔--]

The &6netherite space suit&f is an upgraded version of the &6standard space suit&r, featuring permanent fire resistance, more protection and the ability to survive on &6Venus&f and &6Mercury&f. Before you travel to these planets, you must craft the &6netherite space suit armour&f or else you will burn to death.[--&6下界合金太空服&f是&6标准太空服&r的升级版本,具有永久防火、更多保护以及生存于&6Venus&f和&6Mercury&f的能力。在你前往这些星球之前,你必须制作&6下界合金太空服&f,否则你将烧死。--]
Now that you can fly to &6Venus&r and &6Mercury&r, your new goal is to gather enough &bCalorite&r to build the ultimate rocket.[--现在你可以飞到&6Venus&r和&6Mercury&r了,你的新目标就是收集足够&bCalorite&r来建造最终的火箭.--]
We need to make a trip out to Venus![--我们需要去金星旅行!--]
&dCalorite&r is found on Venus, and is the strongest metal you can gather from the planets.[--&dCalorite&r在金星上找到,是您可以从行星中收集的最坚硬的金属.--]
With this, you can make the &5Tier 4 Rocket&r, as well as the &dJet Suit&r for us to survive in a different Solar System![--有了这个,你可以制作&5四级火箭&r,以及&d喷气式套装&r来让我们在不同的太阳系中生存!--]
A hot barren world with large lava plains.[--一个充满大块熔岩平原的热贫瘠世界。--]
This is the furthest our current technology can take us. &bGlacio&r is a cold planet, but has oxygen for us to breathe![--这是我们当前科技可以走得最远的。&bGlacio&r是一个寒冷的星球,但有氧气供我们呼吸!--]
&dCalorite&r is used to craft the &eultimate rocket&r capable of travelling to a new solar system and more!&r[--&d仙人掌&r用于制作&e终极火箭&r,可以前往新的太阳系和更多!&r--]
Craft a &4Jet Suit[--制作一个&4喷气式套装--]

- The &bJet Suit&r is an upgraded version of the &cNetherite Space Suit&r, with more protection, additional oxygen storage, and &eflight&r. It's expensive to craft, but it offers high-speed flight, making travel easy.&r[---&b喷气式太空服&r是&c下界合金太空服&r的升级版本,具有更多的保护、额外的氧气存储和&e飞行&r.制作成本极高,但它提供高速飞行,使旅行变得简单.&r--]

- It's got two modes of flight: ascending (&aSpace&r) and boosted (&aSpace + Left&r). Ascending makes the wearer fly upwards, while boosted is similar to an elytra that's constantly being propelled by fireworks. The &bJet Suit&r is powered by energy and must be charged to fly. It can be charged with an&r[--- 它有两种飞行模式:升空(&aSpace&r)和提升(&aSpace+left&r)。升空使穿戴者向上飞行,同时提升类似于一直由烟花驱动的鞘翅。&b喷气服&r由能量充能,必须充能飞行。它可以被&r充电。--]
&benergizer&r by right-clicking it with the &bjet suit&r.&r[--&b充能器&r用&b喷气背包&r右键单击它&r.&r--]
Craft a &5Tier 4 &dRocket[--制作一个&5第4级&d套装--]
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_x_applied_ener: Chapter X: Applied Energetics 2[--X章:应用电源2--]
Explore the moon[--探索月球--]
This items can be found in &ldungeons chests on the moon&r.[--这些物品可以在&ldungeons箱子中找到&r.--]
The &8sky stone block&r can be duplicated once obtained one.[--&8天空石块&r在获得后可以复制.--]
It's time to start making some &eProcessors&f. These are an important crafting ingredient used to make the large majority of ME-connected devices.[--是时候开始制作一些&e处理器&f了。这些是制作大多数ME连接设备的重要合成材料.--]
Virtual Storage System[--虚拟存储系统--]
&lWelcome to &bApplied Energistics 2&f![--&l欢迎来到&b应用能源2&f!--]

Applied Energistics 2 (or &oAE2&r for short) is an incredibly versatile &bdigital storage&f mod, allowing for extremely efficient storage and all sorts of automation capabilities to greatly augment your modded Minecraft experience from as early as you want to the very endgame.[--应用能源2 (或者&oAE2&r 短) 是一个非常多功能的&b数字存储&fmod,允许非常高效的存储和各种自动化能力,从你想开始到最末地游戏,极大地扩展你的modd Minecraft经验.--]
Click to Acknowledge[--点击确认--]
Does exactly what you'd expect.[--与你所希望的完全一样。--]

The &bQuartz Wrench&f does what any regular tech mod wrench would do. It rotates blocks and devices along the face you right-click on and dismantles them when right-clicked while sneaking.[--&b石英扳手&f可以像任何普通科技模组扳手一样工作。它会旋转你右键单击的面部的方块和装置,并在潜行右键单击时拆除它们。--]
AE2's wrench comes in both certus and nether quartz flavours.[--AE2的扳手有赛特斯和下界石英的味道.--]
Quartz Wrench[--石英扳手--]
Plug in[--插上--]
While the Charger will natively accept RF/FE, the vast majority of an ME network uses its own dedicated power system called AE.[--充能器将自定义接受RF/FE,但大多数ME网络使用自己的专用电力系统AE.--]

RF/FE can be converted into the native AE at a ratio of 2:1 RF:AE, either directly through an ME Controller, or through the &bEnergy Acceptor&f, which can instead be connected to any part of the network.[--RF/FE可以直接通过ME控制器或&b能源接收器&f以2:1RF:AE的比例转换为本地AE,它可以连接到网络的任何部分.--]

By default, an ME network on its own only has an internal buffer of 800AE without an ME Controller, with the controller adding an extra 8kAE per block. For large enough networks, this can be insufficient and may cause a network to power off intermittently when trying to recoup power for any connected devices.[--默认情况下,ME网络自己只有800AE的内部缓冲,没有ME控制器,控制器每个方块增加8kAE。对于足够大的网络,这可能不够,并且可能导致网络在试图为任何连接的设备恢复电源时断断断续续断电。--]

The &bEnergy Cell&f allows for an ME network to hold significantly more energy, adding another 200kAE per regular Energy Cell and 1.6MAE per &bDense&f Energy Cell. These can also be placed anywhere in the network to provide the increased energy buffer.[--&b能量单元&f允许ME网络容纳更多的能量,每个普通能量单元增加200kAE,每个&b致密&f能量单元增加1.6MAE。这些也可以放置在网络任何地方以提供增加的能量缓冲。--]

The &bEnergy Card&f can be applied to most chargeable devices like Portable Cells and Wireless Terminals (covered later) to also increase &otheir&r energy buffer.[--&b能量卡&f可以应用于大多数可充电的设备,如便携式元件和无线终端(稍后覆盖),以增加&o他们&r的能量缓冲。--]
Quantum Network Bridge[--量子网络桥--]
The &bQuantum Entangled Singularities&f are used to link together a ring-shaped device known as a &eQuantum Network Bridge&f.[--&b量子纠缠奇点&f用于连接一个环形设备,名为&e量子网络桥&f.--]

When two of these individual rings have been linked using the Quantum Entangled Singularities and jumpstarted with some AE power, an ME network can be expanded wirelessly on the other side of the bridge, across either long distances or even dimensions.[--当这些单个环使用量子纠缠奇点连接起来并用一些AE电力启动时,ME网络可以在桥的对面无线扩展,可以长距离甚至维度。--]
Hyper-Condensed Matter[--超凝聚物质--]
Not quite antimatter[--不太反物质--]

When using a 64k storage component or higher, the Matter Condenser becomes able to condense significantly more to produce a &bSingularity&f. A single singularity requires 256000 items to be voided. That's exactly &o4000 stacks&r![--当使用64k存储组件或更高时,物质冷凝器可以大量压缩以产生&b奇点&f.单个奇点需要256000个物品消失.这完全就是&o4000组物品&r!--]

See what happens when you throw this singularity on the ground with a piece of &eender dust&f. You'll have to deal some damage to the surroundings while you're at it, but thankfully AE2 offers its own &bTiny TNT&f to minimise that.[--当你用&e末影尘土&f将这个奇点扔在地上时会变成什么样。当你在地上的时候,你必须给周围环境造成一些伤害,但幸运的是AE2提供了它自己的&bTiny TNT&f来最小化它.--]
Fluix Crystal[--福鲁伊克斯水晶--]

Arguably the most important resource you will need next is &eFluix&f, used throughout the vast majority of AE2 devices and serving as a base for crafting all of the cabling within an ME network.[--可以说,你下一个需要最重要的资源是&e福鲁伊克斯&f,它用于大多数AE2设备,并且作为ME网络中制作所有线缆的基础.--]
Basic Cabling[--基础线缆--]

To connect the vast majority of your ME network together, you will need some cable. &eME Glass Cable&f is the first and most basic kind of cable, and you'll be making this all throughout as the first step towards crafting the other kinds of cable.[--要将ME网络的绝大多数连接在一起,你需要一些线缆。&eME玻璃线缆&f是第一种也是最基础的线缆,你将在制作其他种类的线缆过程中始终制作这个。--]

Both glass cables and their &ecovered&f counterpart can carry up to 8 channels along a single section of cabling. Unlike glass cables, covered cables can subsequently be crafted into &edense&f covered cables, capable of carrying up to 32 channels. However, most \"multipart\" devices such as buses and terminals cannot be directly attached to dense cables, requiring normal-width cables to form a connection instead.[--玻璃线缆及其&e覆盖的&f对口线缆可以沿单个部分的线缆携带多达8个通道。与玻璃线缆不同,覆盖的线缆之后可以制作为&e致密&f包层线缆,可以携带多达32个通道。然而,大多数“多方块”的设备,例如总线和终端不能直接连接到密闭线缆上,需要普通宽线缆才能形成连接。--]

All cables can also be crafted with dye to colour them. Uncoloured (\"Fluix\") cables can connect to any other colour of cable, but otherwise differently-coloured cables will never connect to one another.[--所有线缆都可以用染料制作来给它们染色。未着色的(Fluix)线缆可以连接到任何其他颜色的线缆上,否则不同颜色的线缆永远不会相互连接.--]

In Applied Energistics 2, every ME network has a certain number of &echannels&f available, which simply means how many networked devices can fit on the whole network.[--在应用能源2中,每个ME网络都有一定数量的&e通道&f可用,这意味着整个网络可以装配多少网络设备.--]

As a rule of thumb, any device that more or less handles ME data directly (items stored within the network) and carries out some form of I/O will take up a channel. Usually components that are only concerned with the internal power storage of the network, like &eEnergy Cells&f do &onot&r take up channels.[--根据经验法则,任何设备如果或多或少地直接处理ME数据(存储在网络中的物品)并执行某种I/O,都会占用一个频道。通常情况下,组件只与网络的内部电力存储有关,例如&e能量单元&f做&onot&r拿起通道.--]
Glass Cable[--玻璃线缆--]
Covered Cable[--包层线缆--]
Dense Covered Cable[--致密包层线缆--]
The last piece of the puzzle for any large ME network is the &bME Controller&f.[--任意大型ME网络的最后一个拼图是&bME控制器&f.--]

A controller supplies an ME Network with a far larger number of channels than the standard 8 channels for ad-hoc networks, providing 32 channels out of each face of the block for a total of 216 channels.[--控制器为ME网络提供比标准8个通道更多的通道,从方块每个面提供32个通道,共216个通道。--]

That's only for a single-block controller, however, since the ME Controller is in fact a multi-block structure. The controller can be up to 7x7x7 blocks in size and can come in any freeform arrangement within that maximum size. Each individual block can then provide its own separate set of channels, so long as no single controller block is surrounded by 4 other blocks along the same plane.[--然而,这只用于单个方块控制器,因为ME控制器事实上是一个多方块结构。控制器最多可以有7x7x7个方块大小,并且可以在最大尺寸范围内做出任何自由成型。然后每个单个方块都可以提供自己的一套通道,只要没有单个控制器块被同一平面上的4个其他方块包围。--]

An ME Network may only contain one multiblock controller at any given time. Attempting to connect more than one controller on separate parts of the network will cause a conflict, shutting down the whole network.[--ME网络在任何特定时间只能包含一个多方块控制器。试图在网络的不同部分连接多个控制器会导致冲突,关闭整个网络。--]
Cable Anchor[--线缆锚--]
Under the knife[--刀下方--]
The &bQuartz Cutting Knife&f, like the wrench, comes in both nether and certus quartz flavours and is a useful crafting tool to have on hand.[--&b石英切割刀&f像扳手一样,具有下界和赛特斯石英的味道,是一种有用的制作工具。--]

Cables can also be separated without needing to be coloured by attaching a &bCable Anchor&f between them, crafted using this knife and craftable up to 50 times with the same knife before it breaks.[--线缆也可以通过在线缆之间安装&b线缆锚&f,使用这把刀制作,在它破坏之前最多可以用同一把刀制作50次来将线缆分开.--]

Cable Anchors can also be used to craft &bCable Facades&f, allowing you to disguise cables within walls by covering them with the face of an arbitrary block. While facade recipes are hidden in JEI, you can still craft them by taking any regular block and surrounding it with 4 cable anchors in the crafting grid.[--线缆锚也可以用来制作&b线缆Facades&f,允许你用任意方块表面覆盖线缆来伪装墙上的线缆。虽然墙壁配方隐藏在JEI中,你仍然可以通过在合成终端中拿下任何普通方块并用4个线缆锚来制作它们.--]
Quartz Cutting Knife[--石英切割刀--]
Advanced Cabling[--高级线缆--]

The &bME Smart Cable&f and &bDense Smart Cable&f function identically to the covered cables in terms of channel distribution, but will also visibly display the amount of channels they are using as coloured lines along themselves.[--在频道分配方面,&bME智能线缆&f和&b致密线缆&f的功能与覆盖的线缆相同,但也会直接显示它们作为彩色线缆使用的频道数量.--]
Smart Cable[--智能线缆--]
Dense Smart Cable[--致密智能线缆--]
Color Applicator[--颜色应用器--]

The &bColor Applicator&f is a chargeable tool that allows for in-world dyeing of cables. It functions more or less as a specialised &estorage cell&f to be loaded up with either vanilla dyes or &epaint balls&f for specific colours, along with &esnowballs&f to wash colours off and turn cables back to their Fluix variant.[--&b聚变器&f是一种可充电的工具,允许在世界中染色线缆。它或多或少地像一个特殊的&e存储单元&f一样,为特定颜色加载原版染料或&epaint球&f,同时&es雪球&f可以洗掉彩色并将线缆转回其福鲁伊克斯变体.--]
Applying colour to a cable uses 100AE of energy from its internal battery, for a total of 3400 cable segments in a single charge.[--对线缆应用颜色使用内部电池的100AE能量,一次充电共3400个线缆段。--]
Condensed Matter[--凝聚物质--]
As for wirelessly expanding the ME Network itself, the first step is admittedly somewhat unorthodox.[--关于无线扩展ME网络本身,第一个步骤可以说有些不正则。--]

The &bMatter Condenser&f is AE2's take on a trash can, voiding any items inserted into it. When fitted with a &eStorage Component&f, however, the condenser can harness some left-over energy from the item being voided and store it to make two special crafting items out of enough concentrated energy.[--&b物质冷凝器&f是AE2拿起一个垃圾桶,将输入它的任何物品销毁。然而,当安装了&e存储组件&f时,冷凝器可以从被虚空的物品中提取一些剩余能量并存储它,用足够浓缩的能量制作两个特殊制作物品。--]
The first of these two items is the &bMatter Ball&f, requiring at least a 1k storage component and 256 items' worth of voided material.[--第一个是&b物质球&f,至少需要1k存储元件和256个物品价值的无效材料.--]
The Storage[--存储--]
Items as a file system[--作为文件系统的物品--]

Arguably the most important aspect of Applied Energistics 2 is its storage system, making use of digital &eStorage Cells&f. These cells are accessible through either an &eME Chest&r for single cells, or an &eME Drive&r for multiple cells.[--可以说,应用能源2最重要的方面是它的存储系统,它使用数字&e存储元件&f。这些元件可以通过单个元件的&eME箱子&r或多个元件的&eME驱动器&r来访问.--]

The &bME Chest&f holds a single Cell at a time, which can then be read from and written to from any other terminal on the same network. The ME Chest itself also provides its own terminal screen on the top with specific access only to the cell it contains.[--&bME箱子&f一次可容纳一个单元,然后可以从同一个网络上的任何终端中读取并写入。ME箱子本身也可以在顶部提供它自己的终端屏幕,只有它包含的单元有特定的访问权限。--]

The &bME Drive&f can hold up to 10 assorted Storage Cells in the space of a single block and a single ME channel. However, it does not provide its own terminal screen, requiring some external terminal elsewhere on the network for storage access.[--&bME驱动器&f可以在单个方块和单个ME通道的空间中存储多达10个不同存储元件。然而,它不提供自己的终端屏幕,需要网络上其他地方的一些外部终端才能存储。--]
Defragmentation[--降级--]

The &bME IO Port&f allows for the contents of an ME network's storage to be quickly rearranged between different storage media such as ME cells and external containers connected to storage buses.[--&bMEIO端口&f允许在ME单元和连接到存储总线的外部容器等不同的存储介质之间快速重新配置ME网络的存储内容.--]

When a cell is inserted in an input slot on the left, the IO Port can be toggled to either empty the cell out into other ME storages or fill the (ideally, partitioned) cell with certain items spread out across other storages.[--当一个单元插入左侧输入槽时,IO端口可以切换成将单元清空到其他ME存储器中,或者将某些物品分流到其他存储器中。--]

The &bCell Workbench&f allows for cells to be \"partitioned\" to hold specific items, i.e. given a whitelist filter. It also allows the cell to be upgraded with certain upgrade cards such as the Inverter Card, which sets the aforementioned whitelist to be a blacklist instead.[--&b细胞工作台&f允许“分流”存储特定物品,即给它一个白名单过滤器。它也允许用某些升级卡(例如反向卡)升级单元,该卡将前述白名单设置为黑名单。--]

Cells can also be given a higher or lower \"priority\" via the workbench, i.e. allow the cell to be the first to receive certain items until full, or made to wait for other higher-priority cells to fill up first.[--元件也可以通过工作台得到更高或更低的“优先级”,即允许元件第一个接收到某些物品,直到满,或等待其他更优先级的元件先填充.--]

The &bOverflow Destruction Card&f is a cell upgrade that allows storage cells to delete (void) any items of a type already contained within them, when try to move into the cell and the cell is already full.[--&b反转销毁卡&f是一个单元升级,允许存储元件删除(避免)其中已经包含的任何种类的物品,当尝试移动到元件中时,并且电池已经满了.--]
ME Storage &mCells&r Drawers[--ME存储&m单元&r抽屉--]

The &bEqual Distribution Card&f is an upgrade for storage cells that pre-allocates a certain amount of items that can be taken up by any individual type.[--&b等价分配卡&f是存储元件的升级,可以预分配一定数量的物品,任何单个类型都可以使用.--]

This behaviour is comparable to something like a Functional Storage drawer, wherein each compartment holds a set number of stacks as opposed to allowing items from one compartment to leak into the others and crowd other kinds of items out.[--该行为类似于功能性存储抽屉,其中每个抽屉都装有一定数量的堆叠,而不是允许从一个隔板中流出物品,并将其他种类的物品挤出.--]
Auto-Crafting[--自动合成--]
Order up[--秩序升级--]

Storage is nice and all that, but what good is a storage system if it's clogged up with raw materials needing to be crafted and processed into something and you're still stuck with having to do so manually?[--存储是不错的,所有的,但是如果一个存储系统被需要制作和处理的原料阻挡,并且你仍然需要手动这样做,那它有什么用?--]

AE2's &eauto-crafting&f system begins with the &bME Pattern Provider&f. The Pattern Provider holds certain items called &bPatterns&f (covered in the next quest) which are programmed to hold some recipe that turns input items into a certain output. Up to 9 patterns can fit in one provider.[--AE2的&eeato-craft&f系统从&bME样板供应器&f开始。样板供应器容纳某些名为&b粉末&f的物品(在下一个任务中包含),这些物品被编程为一些将输入物品转化为特定输出的配方。最多9个样板可以安装在同一个供应器中.--]

You'll often be making use of multiple pattern providers scattered all throughout your base, which is why it's useful to have a &bPattern Access Terminal&f to remotely access the contents of any and all providers on your wider ME network.[--你经常会使用分散在你的基地里的多个样板供应器,所以需要一个&b花纹访问终端&f来远程访问你更大的ME网络上的任何和所有供应器的内容。--]
ME Pattern Provider[--ME样板供应器--]
Patterns[--样板--]

&bPatterns&f are what hold an encoded recipe to be fulfilled by a Pattern Provider. To encode a recipe onto a Pattern, the &bME Pattern Encoding Terminal&f must be used.[--&b粉末&f是一个由样板供应器完成的编码配方。要将配方编码到样板上,必须使用&bME样板编码终端&f.--]

Patterns can be set to hold either a regular &ecrafting&f recipe, which will require the use of a &eMolecular Assembler&f on the face of its Provider, or a more general \"&eprocessing&f\" recipe, wherein any input items can be sent out by the provider into some other machine block or specialised processing plant.[--样板可以设置为保留一个普通的&e合成&f配方,这将需要在供应器表面使用&e分子装配台&f,或者一个更通用的“&e处理&f”配方,其中任何输入物品都可以由供应方发送到其他机器方块或特殊处理厂.--]
The &bMolecular Assembler&f is AE2's equivalent of an automatic crafting table, required to fulfil any and all &ecrafting&f pattern jobs.[--&b分子装配台&f相当于AE2的自动制作台,是完成任何&e制作&f样板任务所需的.--]

Molecular Assemblers are capable of transferring power and channels to other ME devices connected to it, but will not themselves take up a channel. Up to 6 MAs can be connected to a single Pattern Provider (if employed) to allow for more crafts to be done in parallel.[--分子装配机可以将电力和通道传输到连接到它的其他ME设备上,但自己不会使用通道。最多可以将6个MAS连接到单个样板供应器(如果使用的话),以允许并行完成更多的工艺。--]

MAs also each have their own dedicated slot for a single crafting pattern, allowing them to function standalone when powered. When operated in this way, any matching items inserted into the MA will be automatically crafted into the result of the pattern.[--MAS每个都有自己的专用插槽,用于制作单个合成样板,允许它们独立工作。当以这种方式操作时,任何输入MAS的匹配物品都会自动制作成该样板的结果.--]

The &bAcceleration Card&f, depending on the device being upgraded with it, will either increase the speed at which the device operates or allow the device to carry out more operations in one go.[--&b加速卡&f取决于正在用它升级的设备,它将提高设备操作的速度或允许设备一次性执行更多的操作.--]

In the case of the &eMolecular Assembler&f, a full set of 5 cards reduces the time taken for the MA to fulfil a craft from one second (with no cards) to one &otick&r.[--在&e分子装配台&f的情况下,全套的5张卡片将完成合成所需的时间从1秒(无卡片)减为1秒&tick&r.--]

The &bME Level Emitter&f, when configured with a specific item and quantity of it to respond to, will emit a redstone signal depending on whether that item stored in the network either falls below, goes above or equals the given quantity.[--当&bME级发射器&f被配置为特定物品和数量来响应时,它将发出红石信号,取决于存储在网络中的物品是否低于、高于或等于给定数量.--]

This can be used, for example, to automatically switch certain machines on with redstone to auto-craft a resource when it falls below a given minimum amount.[--例如,它可用于自动切换某些机器的红石,当它低于给定的最小数量时自动制作资源。--]
Redstone-Controlled ME[--红石控制ME--]

Individual ME devices can also be configured to respond to redstone signals. When upgraded with a &bRedstone Card&f, a device can be configured to do work only when powered with redstone or otherwise as needed.[--单个ME设备也可以被配置为对红石信号做出响应。当用&b红石卡&f升级时,一个设备只能根据需要使用红石或者其他方式进行配置。--]

This behavour can also apply to entire &osections&r of an ME network by using an &bME Toggle Bus&f. This allows a section of the network on the other side of the bus to come online only when the bus is powered by redstone, or to go offline if using an &einverted&f toggle bus.[--这个Behforage也可以通过使用&bMETggle总线&f来应用于ME网络的所有&osections&r.这允许总线另一侧的网络部分在总线用红石充电时上线,或者在使用&e反转&f切换总线时去离线.--]
Automation in upgrade form![--升级中的自动化!--]

When applied as an upgrade to any supported device such as an Interface or Export Bus, the &bCrafting Card&f allows the device in question to automatically send out its own crafting requests for a required (filtered) item. Crafting CPUs can be set to respond only to these requests to prevent taking up CPUs meant for player-requested crafts.[--当作为升级应用于任何支持的设备时,例如接口或导出总线,&b合成卡&f允许该设备自动发送自己对所需(过滤)物品的制作请求。合成CPU可以设置为只响应这些请求,防止占用玩家请求合成的CPU.--]

When the &eLevel Emitter&f is upgraded with the Crafting Card, it can be configured to emit redstone in order to directly facilitate in crafting, by emitting a signal either &owhile&r a crafting job for its given item is detected or specifically &oto&r craft the item. The latter would apply for cases where the only thing needed to make a given item is a redstone signal, without even requiring a crafting pattern.[--当&e高级发射器&f用合成卡升级时,它可以配置为发送红石以直接帮助制作,方法是通过发送信号(&o)&r为其给定物品的制作工作被检测到,或特别&oto&r制作物品。对于制作给定物品所需的唯一东西是红石信号,甚至不需要合成图案的情况,后者将适用。--]
Download more RAM[--下载更多内存--]

Before you can carry out an auto-crafting job, you need a device to actually store the request itself along with any interim items for multi-step crafts. This device is known as a &ecrafting CPU&f.[--在你能够执行自动合成之前,你需要一个设备来实际存储请求本身和任何跨步合成的中间物品。这个设备被称为&e合成CPU&f.--]

A crafting CPU is a multiblock structure requiring at least one &bCrafting Storage&f block, optionally along with any other Crafting Unit. The multiblock can be made in any size, but must be a solid cuboid in order to form and function accordingly.[--合成CPU是一个多方块结构,至少需要一个&b合成存储&f方块,可以与任何其他合成单元一起选择。多方块可以任意尺寸制成,但必须是一个固体幼体,才能相对地成型和工作.--]
Crafting Storage[--合成存储--]
Download more CPU cores[--下载更多CPU核心--]

The &bCrafting Co-Processing Unit&f helps speed up crafting jobs by allowing pattern providers to either send items out to their connected devices faster or to work concurrently to make multiple required ingredients.[--&b合成处理单元&f通过允许样板供应器更快地将物品发送到其连接的设备中或同时工作以制作多种所需的材料来帮助加速制作工作。--]
The base AE2 co-processor provides one co-processor \"thread\".[--基础AE2联动处理器提供1个联动处理器“线程”。--]
Crafting Co-Processor[--合成并行处理器--]
Download more VRAM[--下载更多VRAM--]
The &bCrafting Monitor&f displays the overall item being crafted, along with the remaining quantity of that item still being crafted.[--&b合成监控器&f展示了正在制作的总物品,以及该物品的剩余数量。--]
Both the base AE2 monitor and the MEGA monitor function identically, but are provided for aesthetic purposes.[--基础AE2监控器和MEGA监控器功能相同,但用于美学用途。--]
Crafting Monitor[--合成监控器--]
Creating your first Storage Cell[--制作你的第一个存储元件--]
The first kilobyte.[--第一个千字节。--]
Each individual cell has a certain capacity dictated by the &ecomponent&f that the cell has been crafted with.[--每个元件都有一定的容量,由单元制作的&e组件&f决定.--]
The first of the components is the &b1k ME Storage Component&f, providing &e1024&f \"bytes\" of storage for a given cell.[--第一个组件是&b1kME存储组件&f,为给定单元提供&e1024&f“字节”存储.--]
The last component 256k, provides &e262144&f bytes of storage.[--最后的组件256k,提供&e262144&f字节的存储.--]
Item Storage[--物品存储--]

With the 1k Storage Component, you can now craft yourself a 1k ME Item Storage Cell to start your digital item storage system. You'll most likely want the majority of your storage to be for items, so you'll probably want to make a few &bME Item Storage Cells&f.[--使用1k存储组件,你现在可以自己制作一个1kME物品存储元件来启动您的数字存储系统。你最可能希望你的存储中大多数是物品,所以你可能想要制作一些&bME物品存储元件&f.--]

ME Item Storage Cells can each hold up to 63 different types of items. Each new type of item added to a cell will take up a certain fraction of the storage cell's total capacity in bytes. For each type already present, 1 \"byte\" counts for 8 items of that same type.[--ME物品存储元件可以容纳多达63种不同种类的物品。添加到单元中的每一种新类型的物品将占用存储元件总容量的一定部分。对于已经存在的每一种,1个“字节”为8个相同类型的物品。--]
As an example, a 1k Item Storage Cell containing only cobblestone can hold up to 8128 cobblestone (8*1024b - 8b/type * 1 type).[--例如,一个1k个仅包含圆石的物品存储元件可以容纳多达8128个圆石(8*1024b - 8b/type * 1 type).--]

If a cell is empty, it can be repurposed by disassembling it into its respective component and housing. This is done by sneaking and right-clicking in the air with the cell in your hand.[--如果一个单元是空的,可以通过将其分解成其不同的组件和外壳来重新使用。这是通过潜行和右键单击空中手持的单元来完成的。--]
ME Item Storage Cell[--ME物品存储元件--]
Fluid Storage[--流体存储--]

Items are not the only things that can be stored in ME cells. &bME Fluid Storage Cells&f can store liquids such as water, lava and any variety of modded oils and fuels, just to give a few examples.[--&bME流体存储元件&f可以存储液体,如水、熔岩和任意种类的油和燃料,仅举几个例子.--]

Note that all storage cells, regardless of what they're designed to store, only differ in terms of their housing; both item and fluid cells use the same kind of storage component to make.[--注意,所有存储元件,不管它们设计了什么,它们的容量不同;物品和流体元件使用相同的存储元件来制作.--]
For fluids, 1 byte equals 8 buckets (8000mb).[--对于流体,1字节等于8桶(8000mb)。--]
ME Fluid Storage Cell[--ME流体存储元件--]
&bPortable Cells&f function identically to regular cells in that they can they be inserted into a chest or drive and filled accordingly.[--&b便携式元件&f的功能与普通元件相同,因为它们可以插入箱子或驱动器中并相应填充.--]

However, unlike regular cells, their contents can also be accessed standalone via the cell item itself, a bit like a digital ME-flavoured backpack.[--然而,与普通单元不同,它们的内容也可以通过单元物品本身独立访问,有点像ME-forforded背包.--]
ME Portable Cell[--ME便携元件--]

The next thing to make to allow for wireless network access is the &bME Wireless Access Point&f. The Access Point is used to open the network to wireless access via a &ewireless terminal&f, and has a set (finite) range depending on how many &bWireless Boosters&f are inserted into the access point.[--接下来是&bME无线接入点&f。访问点用于通过&e无线终端&f打开网络无线访问,并且具有一个取决于&b无线推进器&f插入访问点的套装(无限)范围.--]
This is what you're here for[--这就是你在这里的目的--]
The &bWireless Terminal&f functions identically to a regular terminal, but wirelessly.[--&b无线终端&f的功能与普通终端相同,但无线。--]

Before it can be used to access a network, it must first be &elinked&f to the network by placing it into the top-right slot of the &eWireless Access Point&r. If it is not linked to a network, or is out of either range or power, the terminal will not function.[--在它可用于访问网络之前,它必须先通过将其放入&e无线访问点&r的右上插槽&e连接&f到网络。如果它没有连接到网络,或超出范围或功率,终端将不工作。--]
Wireless terminals can also be upgraded with &eEnergy Cards&f to provide a larger internal battery.[--无线终端也可以使用&e能量卡&f升级,以提供更大的内部电池.--]
Spatial IO[--空间IO--]

Aside from the storage of items and fluids, AE2 also provides a native way of storing entire &estructures&f inside of storage cells, not too dissimilarly to the Compact Machines mod.[--除了存储物品和流体外,AE2还提供了一种在存储元件中存储整个&e结构&f的本地方法,与压缩机器mod类似。--]

The &bSpatial IO Port&f allows structures contained within a &bSpatial Containment Structure&f to be captured within a specially-designed storage cell, activated via a redstone signal.[--&b空间IO端口&f允许将&b空间内存结构&f中的结构捕获到特殊制作的存储元件中,通过红石信号激活.--]

If a mob or player happens to stand inside of the SCS while the space is being captured, they too will be transported to where the rest of the space goes, i.e. in a dedicated dimension. Just make sure you have a way to get back out and in if you're the one being captured.[--如果怪物或玩家在空间被捕获时碰巧站在SCS内部,它们也会被传送到空间的其他部分,即一个专用维度中。只需确保你有一个返回的方法,如果你是被捕获的。--]
Spatial Pylon[--空间塔--]

The Spatial Containment Structure (SCS) consists of a cage of &bSpatial Pylons&f covering the volume you wish to enclose in a Spatial IO cell. At the absolute minimum, an SCS requires three lines of spatial pylon blocks, one for each dimension of the space being contained (length, width, height).[--空间控制结构(SCS)包含一个&b空间塔&f的笼子,覆盖了您想要插入的空间IO单元的体积。在绝对最小范围内,SCS需要三行空间塔块,每个空间维度(长度、宽度、高度)都有一条线。--]

However, Spatial IO is an extremely power-hungry feature, especially when trying to capture much larger spaces (up to 128x128x128). Having more spatial pylons included in the SCS around the desired volume will increase its overall &eefficiency&f, allowing it to use less energy to capture.[--然而,空间IO是一个极强的饥饿特性,特别是当试图捕获更大的空间(多达128x128x128)。拥有更多的空间塔将增加其整体&e效率&f,允许它减少使用能量来捕捉。--]

Also, be mindful that each individual pylon (regardless of its length) takes up one channel. For particularly large spaces, you may wish to build a dedicated network with a controller to fit all the required pylons.[--另外,请注意,每个塔(不管其长度如何)占用一个通道。对于特别大的空间,你可能希望建造一个带有控制器的专用网络,以适应所有所需的塔。--]
Spatial Cell Component[--空间单元组件--]

&bSpatial Storage Cells&f are used to hold one defined volume each, and come in three different capacities allowing for a maximum of 2x2x2, 16x16x16 and 128x128x128 blocks' worth of space.[--&b空间存储元件&f用于每个存储一个定义的体积,具有三种不同的容量,最多2x2x2、16x16x16和128x128x128x128的方块的空间值.--]

Upon encoding, a cell is allocated a section of space within the spatial storage &edimension&f, along with a unique ID corresponding to the region allocated to the cell. An encoded cell can still be used within the Spatial IO Port to retrieve any stored blocks and entities.[--编码后,一个单元在空间存储&edimension&f中分配了部分空间,同时有一个与分配到单元的区域相对应的唯一ID。一个编码的单元仍然可以在空间IO端口中用于取回任何存储的方块和实体。--]

From then on, any blocks contained either within the cell's region of space or in an SCS with the same size as the one used for the initial encoding can be moved back into the overworld or into the spatial dimension respectively. If there are blocks both within the spatial region and within the SCS, these will simply swap places accordingly.[--从那以后,任何包含在单元空间区域内的方块,或包含在SCS中的任何方块,其大小与初始编码中使用的方块相同,都可以分别移动回主世界或空间维度中。如果在空间区域内和在SCS中都有方块,则这些方块会相应地交换位置.--]
Spatial Storage Cell[--空间存储元件--]

The &bSpatial Anchor&f is a companion device from the Spatial IO lineage that simply functions as a chunk loader. When connected to an ME network, the Anchor will force-load all the chunks occupied by the ME network across all cables and devices, excluding subnetworks, as long as the network remains powered.[--&b空间锚&f是一个来自空间IOlineg的辅助设备,只是作为区块加载器。当连接到ME网络时,该锚将强制将ME网络占用的所有区块加载到所有电缆和装置中,排除子网络,只要网络保持供电。--]
The IO[--IO--]
OI, OI, OI![--OI,OI,OI!--]
To make life that much easier, AE2 provides a whole suite of devices for the manipulation of ME data, i.e. moving stored items around the world.[--为了让生活更加简单,AE2为ME数据提供全套操作设备,即将存储的物品移动到世界。--]

The &bME Interface&f is one of these devices. As an input device, the Interface allows any item/fluid/etc to be piped externally through it, which is then automatically stored in the ME Network that the interface is connected to.[--&bME接口&f是这些设备之一。作为输入设备,接口允许任何物品/流体/etc通过外部管道,然后自动存储在接口连接的ME网络中。--]

As an output device, the Interface can be configured to keep a certain available amount of a stored item in stock, from the ME network to its own internal inventory. This allows items to then be received by some external source like another player or some pipe.[--作为输出设备,接口可以配置为将一定数量的存储物品存储在库存中,从ME网络到自己的内部库存中。这允许一些外部来源,例如另一个玩家或一些管道接收物品。--]
ME Interface[--ME接口--]
Forgot to Mention[--忘记提一下--]
This has a use outside of crafting cables.[--除了制作线缆,这还可以使用.--]

An important concept within AE2 is a technique known as \"&esubnetting&f\", wherein an extra separate ME network (a &esubnetwork&f) acts in conjuction with the main network to perform some specialised function or process.[--AE2中的一个重要概念是被称为 \"&e子网络&f \" 的科技,其中有一个额外的单独的ME网络(a&e子网络&f)与主网络共鸣,以执行一些特定的功能或过程.--]

What separates a subnetwork from a completely detached separate network is usually the use of the &bQuartz Fiber&f as a cable part. When placed between two otherwise unconnected lengths of cable, the Quartz Fiber transfers no data or channels between the two whatsoever, instead only transmitting power.[--将子网络与完全分离的网络分离开来,通常是使用&b石英纤维&f作为线缆的一部分。当放置在两个否则没有连接的线缆之间时,石英纤维不传输任何数据或频道,而只是传输电力。--]

Thus, a subnetwork on the other side of the Fiber can be powered wholly by the main network's power source, without requiring any extra dedicated powergen.[--因此,纤维另一侧的子网络可以完全由主网络的电源供电,而不需要任何额外的专用电源。--]
P2P Tunnels[--P2P隧道--]
Cut out the middleman[--切换中继器--]

&bP2P&f (peer-to-peer) is a powerful system within AE2, allowing for the transfer of items, fluids and even more without the need for any intermediary ME storage.[--&bP2P&f(Peer-to-peer)是AE2的一个强大的系统,允许转移物品、流体甚至更多,而不需要任何中级ME存储.--]

Right-clicking on a P2P tunnel with certain items will &eattune&f the tunnel into one capable of transferring something else, such as items through pipes, energy through cables, redstone signals and (by default) even ME connections themselves.[--右键单击带有某些物品的P2P隧道会&eattune&f该隧道变成一个可以传输其他物品的隧道,例如通过管道传输物品,通过电缆提供能量,红石信号甚至(默认情况下)ME连接自己。--]
P2P tunnels must be linked to one another with the use of a &eMemory Card&f, detailed in the next quest.[--P2P通道必须使用&e记忆卡&f相互连接,在下一个任务中详细介绍。--]

The &bMemory Card&f is a tool with two different functions. The simplest of the two is to save various devices' configurations (such as whitelist filters) to be copied over to another device of the same kind.[--&b记忆卡&f是一种具有两种不同功能的工具。两种功能中最简单的是保存各种设备配置(例如白名单过滤器)以复制到另一个相同类型的设备。--]

The second function of a memory card is to link &eP2P tunnels&f together. When doing so, the P2P tunnel being linked will be assigned a unique ID, which is stored on the memory card for further linking.[--内存卡的第二个功能是将&eP2P隧道&f连接在一起。这样做时,连接的P2P隧道将被分配一个独特的ID,存储在内存卡上以进一步链接.--]
Memory Card[--存储卡--]
The... Weapons?[--武器?--]
Too hot for the ATF[--ATF太热了--]
These last three items are more or less some extra toys provided by AE2 and don't necessarily fit under any of these quest trees.[--这三件物品或多或少是AE2提供的一些额外的玩具,不一定适合任何这些任务树。--]

The &bCharged Staff&f is just a simple powered staff which deals 3 hearts of damage and consumes 300AE per hit. It also uses pre-1.9 combat mechanics, meaning that you can spam-click with this like in the good old days.[--&b充能法杖&f只是一个简单的充能法杖,每次击中会造成3颗心伤害并消耗300AE.它也使用1.9前战斗力,这意味着你可以像在前日一样用这个刷子单击.--]

The &bEntropy Manipulator&f, when &oused&r on certain blocks in the world, will smelt them in-place, such as sand to glass and metal ores to metal ingots. If not, it will simply light a fire on the block.[--&bEntropy Manipulator&f,当&oused&r在世界上某些方块上时,会将它们烧成正方形,例如沙子到玻璃,金属矿石到金属锭.如果不是,它会直接点燃方块的火.--]

Finally, the &bMatter Cannon&f functions similarly to the Color Applicator as a dedicated cell for holding \"ammo\" items such as Matter Balls and iron/gold nuggets, which can then be fired out to deal damage to mobs or break blocks. Heavier \"ammo\", e.g. metal nuggets, will deal more damage and destroy harder blocks.[--最后,&b物质加农炮&f与彩色充能器类似,是一个用于存储“弹药”物品(如物质球和铁/金粒)的单元,然后可以发射出去对生物造成伤害或破坏方块。例如金属粒,加维埃“弹药”将造成更多伤害并摧毁更坚硬的方块。--]

Matter Balls in a Matter Cannon can be substituted with &bPaint Balls&f, which will apply a paint splatter effect on the face of whatever block being fired at. &bLumen Paint Balls&f are a variant of paint balls exclusively used by the Matter Cannon, whose paint splatters also give off some light once present in the world.[--物质加农炮中的物质球可以用&b染色球&f替换,这将对被射向的任何方块的表面施加喷涂效果。&bLummen Pans Balls&f是物质加农炮专用的彩色球的变体,一旦物质加农炮存在,它的彩色喷溅也会发出一些光。--]
The O[--O--]

The &bME Export Bus&f periodically spits items in its whitelist filter out to whatever external storage the bus is facing. Unlike the Import Bus, the Export Bus cannot work without being filtered.[--&bME导出总线&f会将白名单过滤器中的物品定期吐出到总线面对的任何外部存储中。与输入总线不同,导出总线只有在被过滤的情况下才能工作.--]
GET OUT[--出去!--]

The &bME Formation Plane&f acts similarly to the Storage Bus, but treats the world itself as its storage medium. In other words, it will place down any block in its filter directly in front of itself.[--&bME成型飞机&f与存储总线相似,但将世界本身作为存储中继器。换句话说,它会直接将过滤器中的任何方块放置在它前面.--]
This can be useful for situations where a block can be processed simply by placing it and breaking it with a certain tool.[--这对一个方块可以通过放置它和用特定工具破坏它来进行处理的情况很有用。--]
The spare chest[--多余的箱子--]

The &bME Storage Bus&f, when facing some external storage container, will allow the container to be used as though it were part of the ME network, allowing items to be taken out from the container or inserted into it purely via ME.[--当面对一些外部存储容器时,&bME存储总线&f将允许容器像ME网络的一部分一样使用,允许物品从容器中取出或纯通过ME输入.--]

Storage buses can be filtered and given specific priorities such that specific items will try to go to the attached storage first, however it will not retroactively move any filtered items from anywhere else in the network to its attached storage.[--存储总线可以过滤,并给特定优先级,让特定物品先尝试前往连接的存储,但是它不会将任何过滤物品从网络的任何地方延展到其连接的存储。--]

The &bCapacity Card&f allows a bus upgraded with it to carry a larger filter. Import and Export buses upgraded with capacity cards can go from supporting only one filtered item each to their maximum nine-slot filter, while Storage buses will go from 18 slots to a maximum of 63.[--&b容量卡&f允许用它升级的总线携带更大的过滤器。用容量卡升级的总线可以从只支持1个过滤物品到最多9个插槽过滤器,而存储总线将从18个插槽到最多63个插槽。--]
Loosely Speaking[--轻而易举--]
The remaining two IO cards[--剩余两个IO卡片--]

The &bFuzzy Card&f allows a filtered item to be matched regardless of any (NBT) metadata such as damage or enchantments, while the &bInverter Card&f toggles the filter on such buses from being a whitelist to being a blacklist.[--&bFuzzy卡&f允许过滤的物品匹配任何(NBT)元数据,例如伤害或附魔,而&b反向卡&f则将这种总线上的过滤器从白名单切换为黑名单.--]
The I[--I--]

The &bME Import Bus&f periodically sucks items in from whatever external storage the bus is facing. It can optionally be filtered to only take in certain items from said inventory.[--&bME导入总线&f会从总线面前的外部存储器中不时抽取物品.它可以选择过滤器,只接收指定库存中的某些物品.--]
GET IN[--入门--]

The &bME Annihilation Plane&f can be used to automatically break any blocks in front of it and return anything dropped by the block directly to the ME network.[--&bME破坏飞机&f可以用来自动破坏它前面的任何方块,并将方块掉落的任何东西直接返还ME网络.--]

As an added bonus, the Annihilation Plane can be enchanted in the same way as a regular digging tool, affecting block drops in the same way as that enchanted tool would. This makes it ideal for processing ore blocks when enchanted with Fortune, for example.[--作为额外的奖励,破坏飞机可以像普通的挖掘工具一样附魔,对方块掉落物施加与附魔工具相同的效果。例如,当附魔时,它会更适合处理矿石块。--]

Any added enchantments significantly increase the amount of energy used by the plane every time a block is broken. Enchanting the plane with &eEfficiency&f will decrease the overall energy use incurred by all other enchantments, while the &eUnbreaking&f enchantment gives the plane the chance to only use any energy sometimes, similarly to Unbreaking on regular tools.[--任何添加的附魔都会在每次破坏方块时大幅提高飞机的能量消耗量。用&e效率&f给飞机附魔会减少其他所有附魔产生的总能量使用量,而&e破坏&f附魔会使飞机有几率偶尔使用任何能量,类似于在普通工具上不破坏.--]
ftbquests.chapter.deeper_and_darker.titl: &3The Otherside: &0Deeper and Darker[--&3异界:&0更深更深,更暗--]
ftbquests.chapter.deeper_and_darker.ques: Found underground in the &aOverworld&r.[--在&a主世界&r下方发现.--]
Kill a Warden[--杀死一名监守者--]
Craft a &9Warden Helmet[--制作一个&9卫兵头盔--]
Used to negate the darkness in &8&lThe Otherside.[--用于在&8&l异界中消除黑暗。--]

Before lighting the portal, you must first remove all &3Sculk Veins &rfrom the inner frame. After the frame is cleared, you can right click it with the &bHeart of The Deep &rthat you got earlier from killing The Warden.[--在照明传送门之前,你必须先从内部框架移除所有&3史古克树脂&r.在框架清除后,你可以用你早期杀死监守者后获得的&b深渊之心&r右键单击它.--]
Kill a Shattered[--杀死一个破碎的--]
Rare chance of spawning after breaking an &8Ancient Vase&r.[--破坏&8古代花瓶&r后生成几率.--]
Kill a Stalker[--杀死一个尾行者--]
Kill a &7Shriek Worm[--杀死一个&7史莱克蠕虫--]
Found by stepping on Infested Sculk[--踩在感染史古克上获得--]
Kill a Shriek Worm[--杀死一只苦力怕虫--]
Find a &2Sculk Snapper[--找到一个&2骷髅捕捉者--]
Can be tamed with enchanted &cNetherite Chestplates&r. When tamed, they will occasionally drop enchanted books. [--可以用附魔&c下界合金胸甲&r驯服.驯服后,它们偶尔会掉落附魔书.--]
Forbidden and Arcanus[--禁忌和奥术--]
Welcome to &5Forbidden \\&\\ Arcanus![--欢迎来到&5禁制PPP\\c奥术!--]
Forbidden \\&\\ Arcanus adds new ways to get better armor, enchants, and more![--禁用PPP\\\ Arcanus增加了获得更好的盔甲、附魔和更多的新方式!--]
This magic-themed mod has amazing animations, as well as some overpowered items like the &6Eternal Stella&r. [--这个魔法主题mod有令人惊叹的动画,以及一些压倒性强的物品,比如&6永恒恒星&r.--]
Welcome to Forbidden \\&\\ Arcanus![--欢迎来到禁止PPP\\c奥术!--]
Edelwood Trees[--埃德木树--]
Found within the Dark Forest biome, the Edelwood Tree looks like a small tree that has been chopped in half.[--在黑暗森林生物群系中发现,埃德木树看起来像一棵被切成两半的小树。--]
You'll need to break the branches off and collect the logs, as these are used for crafting various items within the mod.[--您需要分解树枝并收集原木,因为它们用于在mod中制作各种物品。--]
A Silk-Touch Pickaxe[--精准采集镐--]
The Mystical Dagger is used to break Dragon Heads down to Dragon Scales.[--神秘匕首用于将龙头破碎成龙鳞。--]
When killing mobs with it with a test tube in your inventory, it will also collect blood.[--当用你的物品栏中的测试管道杀死怪物时,它也会收集血液.--]
The Edelwood bucket can store more than one bucket of liquid, and can also be used to capture small animals like chickens or squids.[--埃德木桶可以存储一个以上的桶液体,也可以用于捕捉小动物,比如鸡或鱿鱼。--]
You'll need the Permafrost enchant to use it to carry Lava.[--您需要永冻石附魔来使用它来携带熔岩.--]
Arcane Crystals[--奥术水晶--]
This is the main resource in the mod. Go out and mine some![--这是mod中的主要资源。出去挖一些!--]
Nipa Plants[--尼帕植物--]
Have you seen the random floating island in the sky? Not the slime one, but the tiny one?[--你见过空中随机漂浮的岛屿吗?不是史莱姆的,而是小的?--]
These have the Nipa plant on them. You can break these and relocate them.[--这些有Nipa的植物。你可以破坏它们并移动它们.--]
They produce Arcane Crystal Dust Specks over time, which can be used to create Arcane Crystal Dust.[--它们随时间产生奥术水晶粉,可用于制造奥术水晶粉。--]
Smelting down Arcane Crystals will give you Arcane Crystal Dust.[--熔炼奥术水晶会给你奥术水晶粉。--]
This is used for most of the items in the mod.[--它用于mod中的大多数物品。--]
Breaking spawners will now drop &9Spawner Scraps&r.[--破坏刷怪笼现在会掉落&9刷怪笼碎片&r.--]
Entity Tools[--实体工具--]
The &9Quantum Catcher&r is used to capture and transport mobs.[--&9量子捕捉器&r用于捕捉和传送生物.--]
Highlights Mobs when Activated[--激活时高亮显示怪物--]
This gives X-Ray vision for mobs, highlighting them from afar to make it easier to spot them.[--这为怪物提供X射线视线,从远处显示它们以更容易发现它们.--]
Use on Farmland to make it Magical![--在耕地上使用来让它变魔法!--]
Using this bone meal on Farmland will convert it to Magical Farmland.[--在耕地上使用这顿骨粉会将其转化为魔法农田。--]
Crops will produce double the output when grown on Magical Farmland.[--当种植在魔法农场上时,作物产出将翻倍.--]
Growing Gold[--生长中的金--]
These can be planted to grow Arcane Gold Nuggets.[--这些可以种植成奥术金粒。--]
To create one, you'll need to find Yellow Orchids.[--要制作一个,你需要找到黄色兰花。--]
Dragon Scales[--龙鳞--]
Dragon Scales, Dragon Scales.....[--龙鳞,龙鳞......--]
Combining a Dragon Head with a Mystical Dagger will give you &9Dragon Scales&r.[--将龙头和神秘匕首结合,会给你&9龙鳞&r.--]
&1Draco Arcanus Armor&r[--&1Draco Arcanus护甲&r--]
Better than Netherite[--比下界合金更好--]
The Dragon Scale can be made into a Golden and Aquatic Dragon Scales.[--龙鳞可以做成金和水生龙鳞。--]
These are mainly used to craft &dTyr Armor&r. It is also needed in the ATM Star recipe.[--这些主要用于制作&dTyr盔甲&r.ATM Star配方中也需要它.--]
Used to corrupt Souls and Runes. You'll need this for later.[--用于腐化灵魂和符文。之后你需要它。--]

If you throw down Dark Matter, then throw down Corrupti Dust, it'll create a Black Hole. Feed it small entities like Arrows or Experience Orbs, and it'll produce Xpetrified Orbs.[--如果你扔下暗物质,然后扔下腐化尘土,它会生成一个黑洞。喂它小实体,比如箭或经验宝珠,它会生成Xpetrifed Obs.--]
Mundabitur Dust[--Mundabiture粉--]
Let the Dusts Combine[--让尘土融合--]
Using our Arcane Crystal Dust, we'll need to combine it with other dusts and powders to create Mundabiter Dust.[--使用奥术水晶粉,我们需要与其他粉尘和粉尘结合,以产生普通粉尘。--]
This dust is used in several recipes, as well as activating the Hephaestus Forge.[--这种尘土用于几种配方,同时激活Hephaestus Forge.--]
&6Deorum Ingots[--&6暗影锭--]
The &6Deorum Ingots&r is needed to continue your progression in the mod.[--需要&6末影锭&r来继续你的mod。--]
It's used for a lot of stuff.[--它用于许多东西。--]
&5Tyr Armor[--&5泰尔盔甲--]
Sanity[--神性--]
Am I going insane?[--我会发狂吗?--]
Killing passive mobs will increase your corruption. Killing &9Aureal Entities&r has a higher chance to increase your corruption.[--杀死被动生物会增加你的腐化。杀死&9自然实体&r有更高的几率增加你的腐化。--]
Be careful! At higher levels of corruption, negative things will happen![--注意!在更高的腐化等级下,会发生负面事件!--]
Making a Sanity Meter will give your UI an upgrade to show your total corruption, for those who want to hit new high scores and such.[--制作一个圣洁仪将给您的UI一个升级,以显示你的完全腐化,对于想要达到新的高分的人来说。--]
&1The Hephaestus Forge[--&1血肉锻炉--]
This forge allows you to perform rituals to obtain powerful items. It can also be upgrade.[--这个锻造炉可以让你进行仪式来获得强大的物品。它也可以升级。--]
We'll be using all of that Darkstone to create the &6Hephaestus Forge&r.[--我们将使用所有这些黑暗石来制作&6血肉锻炉&r.--]
Once you have all of the blocks needed, you'll need to build the platform for the forge.[--一旦你拥有了所需的所有方块,你需要为锻造台建造平台。--]
Once built, place a Smithing Table in the center, then sneak+right-click with a piece of Mundabitur Dust.[--建造后,在中心放置一个锻造台,然后潜行+右键单击一个Mundabiturar粉。--]
The &9Lens of Veritatis&r is used to see Aureal entities.[--&9VeritatisLens&r用于查看Aureal实体.--]
These are entities that will grant Aureal when killed, but will also increase your corruption....[--这些实体在杀死后会获得AuReal,但也会增加你的腐化......--]
Smelting &9Edelwood&r will give you Dark Matter.[--冶炼&9埃德木&r会给你暗物质.--]
You can make Black Holes with this.[--你可以用它制作黑洞。--]
Blood is collected by crafting Test Tubes, then killing mobs with the Mystical Dagger.[--血液通过制作测试管收集,然后用神秘匕首杀死生物。--]
Note: The Test Tube must be in your inventory when killing mobs.[--注意:在杀死生物时,测试管必须放在你的物品栏中。--]
&9Aureal[--&9Aureal--]
&dAureal Bottles&r can be found in loot chests, but they can also be crafted using Arcane Crystal Dust.[--&d灵气瓶&r可以在战利品箱中找到,但它们也可以使用奥术水晶粉制作.--]
You can also generate Aureal with Arcane Crystal Obelisks.[--你也可以用奥术水晶方尖碑产生绿宝石。--]
&dSouls[--&d灵魂--]
Souls are gathered by creating a &9Soul Extractor&r, and then using it on Soul Sand.[--通过制作&9灵魂提取器&r来收集灵魂,然后在灵魂沙上使用.--]
&aBottle O' Enchanting[--&a瓶子O'附魔--]
Experience in a bottle[--瓶子里的经验--]
This goes in the right side of the forge.[--它会进入锻造厂的右侧。--]
The Forge requires 4 different items to be powered: Aureal, Souls, Blood, and Experience.[--Forge需要4种不同的物品供能:AUReal,灵魂,血液和经验。--]
To learn more, follow the corner quests.[--要了解更多,请跟随角落任务。--]
Powering the Forge[--给锻造台供电--]
Darkstone Pedestals[--黑暗石基座--]
To enchant items, you'll need Darkstone Pedestals placed around the Forge.[--要附魔物品,你需要放置在锻造台周围的暗黑石基座。--]
Make sure to place these on the Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone.[--一定要把它们放在磨制奥术制暗黑石上.--]
Performing Rituals[--进行仪式--]
To perform a ritual, place the ingredients on the Arcane Pedestals.[--要进行仪式,请将材料放在奥术基座上。--]
You'll need a &9Blacksmith's Gavel&r to activate the ritual. To do this, right click on the Forge with the Gavel.[--你需要一个&9铁匠锤&r来激活仪式。要这样做,请用锤子右键单击FEGE.--]
Blacksmith Gavel[--铁匠锤--]
&1Draco Tools[--&1Draco工具--]
Dragon Tools[--龙工具--]
&1Draco Weapons[--&1Draco武器--]
Go Pew Pew[--去PewPew--]
The Scepter shoots out energy orbs when charged up with Right-Click. If a mob is hit, it'll strike it with lightning.[--权杖在充能右击时会发射能量球。如果怪物被击中,它会用闪电击中它。--]
To create an Arcane Crystal Obelisk, place down an Arcane Polished Darkstone block, then place two Arcane Crystal Blocks on top of it.[--要制作一个奥术水晶方尖碑,请放置一个磨制奥术暗黑石块,然后在上面放两个奥术水晶块。--]
Right-click with Mundabitur Dust and you'll create the obelisk.[--用Mundabitur粉右键单击,你就会制作方尖碑.--]
When placed on a Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone block on the Hephaestus Forge structure, it will slowly generate Aureal over time.[--当放置在Hephaestus Forge结构上的奥术制磨制暗黑石块上时,随着时间的推移,它会缓慢产生AUDERI。--]
Arcane Crystal Obelisks[--奥术水晶方尖碑--]
Clibano Building[--Clibano Building--]
not implemented yet[--尚未执行--]
The sea modifier[--海之强化--]

The Sea Prism applies the Aquatic modifier to helmets allows breaking blocks while swimming without a speed decrease and grants you some additional regeneration while in water[--海晶石对头盔施加水生升级,允许在不降低速度的情况下破坏方块,在水下可以给你一些额外的再生效果--]
Demolishing modifier[--销毁升级--]

The demolishing modifier can unlock the true power out of your tools (Pickaxes, Shovels, Axes, Hoes). Tools with this modifier will be able to break a 3x3 area.[--拆除升级可以解锁你工具(镐子、锹子、斧子、锄子)的真正电源。使用此升级工具可以破坏3x3的区域。--]
Magnetized modifier[--磁化强化器--]

The magnetized modifier can only be used on Boots. When boots with this modifier are equipped, the item pick-up range of the player will increase by one and a half blocks.[--磁化强化器只能用于靴子上。当装备了该强化器的靴子时,玩家的物品拾取范围将增加一个半方块.--]
Fiery modifier[--炽热强化器--]

The fiery modifier can be applied to all tool items (Pickaxes, Shovels, Axes, Hoes) and will automatically smelt all mined blocks if they have a smelting recipe[--火热升级可以应用于所有工具物品(镐子、锹子、斧子、锄子),如果有冶炼配方,将自动烧炼所有矿块--]
Eternal modifier[--永恒强化--]
Removes the durability from an item[--从物品中移除耐久--]
ftbquests.chapter.renewable_ores.title: &o&l&aRenewable ores&r&r[--&o&l&a可更新矿石&r&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.renewable_ores.quests1: combine the two liquids[--结合两种液体--]
You don't need to keep making liquid. If you place it correctly its infinite.[--你不需要继续制作液体。如果你正确放置它,它就会无限。--]
Activate with tnt them place Cobbled Asurine near it.[--使用tnt激活它附近的紫颂石圆石.--]

combine the two liquids[--结合两种液体--]

ftbquests.chapter.renewable_ores.quests2: combine the two liquids[--结合两种液体--]
You don't need to keep making liquid. If you place it correctly its infinite.[--你不需要继续制作液体。如果你正确放置它,它就会无限。--]
