Dormant Molten Veridium[--杜尔曼特熔融辉绿石--]
combine the two liquids[--结合两种液体--]
You don't need to keep making liquid. If you place it correctly its infinite.[--你不需要继续制作液体。如果你正确放置它,它就会无限。--]
Activate with tnt them place napalm bomb near it.[--使用tnt激活它周围放置凝固汽油弹。--]
Dormant Molten Scoria[--杜曼特熔融熔渣--]
Activate with tnt them place Cobbled Ochrum near it.[--使用tnt激活它附近的圆石。--]
Dormant Molten Ochrum[--杜曼特熔融金--]
ftbquests.chapter.renewable_ores.quests6: If you find one mark it on map cus you will need it later :)[--如果你在地图上找到一个标记,你稍后会需要它:)--]
&6Molten Vents&r is a mod which adds a renewable source of the orestones.[--&6Molten Vents&r是一个增加了矿石再生源的mod.--]
These ore stones include: &2Veridium,&r &3Asurine&r, &4Crimsite,&r &6Ochrum,&r &0Scorchia&r and &8Scoria.&r[--这些矿石包括:&2凋灵晶石,&r&3古灵石&r,&4绯红石,&r &6黑石,&r &0焦炉&r和&8黑石&r.&r--]

The vents contain immovable dormant orestones in them, which when exploded will convert into molten orestones place the required material into the corresponding orestone when near it.[--喷气口中包含不动的悬停矿石,当爆炸时会转化为熔融矿石,当它靠近时将所需的材料放入对应的矿石中。--]
&4&lTo activate the dormant orestones you must explode them.&r&r[--&4&l激活悬停的矿石,你必须引爆它们.&r&r--]

This will explode the visual debris on the texture of the block and convert it into a molten orestone, allowing it to make contact with and begin converting the required material into the orestones.[--这将在方块的材质上爆炸视觉残片,将其转化为熔融矿石,允许它接触所需的材料并开始将所需的材料转换成矿石。--]
Activate with tnt them place chocolate cake or honey cake near it.[--通过tNT激活,它们会在上面放巧克力蛋糕或蜂蜜蛋糕.--]
Dormant Molten Scorchia[--杜尔曼特熔融焦黑熔渣--]

ftbquests.chapter.simply_swords.title: Simply Swords[--简单的剑--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.title: &6The Aether[--&6以太--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests0.des: Skyroot is the Oak of this dimension, try to gather some and create a Crafting Table.[--天根是这个维度的橡木,尝试收集一些并创建一个工作台。--]
&7&o*other wood types can be used...[--&7&o* 可以使用其他类型的木材......--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests1.des: These are the same tier as Overworld wooden tools, but they alos have another cool feature.[--这些等级与主世界木制工具相同,但它们有另一个很酷的特性。--]
When using the correct tool for the job, you'll gain double the drops![--当工作使用正确的工具时,你将获得双倍的掉落物!--]
Can mine &eAmbrosium&r Ore.[--可以开采&eAmbrosium&r矿石.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests2.des: The Stone tools of the &bAether&r.[--&b天境&r的石头工具.--]
Can rarely drop &eAmbrosium Shards&r when used on the correct block or slaying creatures with the sword.[--当在正确的方块上使用或用剑杀死生物时,很少会掉落&eAmbrosium碎片&r.--]
Can mine &5Zanite&r and &9Veridium&r Ore.[--可以开采&5紫晶&r和&9下界合金&r矿石.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests3.des: As strong as Iron gear from the Overworld.[--与主世界的铁齿轮一样强大。--]
But the more durability used, the faster it mines.[--但是耐久度越高,采掘速度就越快。--]
The sword also increases damage output with how much durability it has.[--这把剑还增加了耐久度的伤害。--]
Can mine &2Skyjade&r and &dGravitite&r Ore[--可以开采&2石英&r和&d重力晶&r矿石--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests4.tit: Gravitite Tool Set[--重力晶工具套装--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests4.des: The best obtainable gear in the line of progression.[--在进度线中获得最好的装备。--]
This tool set has high durability and its pretty much on the same level as diamond gear from the Overworld.[--这套工具具有更高的耐久性,与主世界的钻石齿轮差不多。--]
It also has another interesting mechanic, when attacking mobs for example they'll be flung into the sky![--它还有另一个有趣的机械师,例如,当攻击生物时,它们会被扔到空中!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests5.des: Think of this as yellow Coal.[--把它当做黄色煤炭。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests6.des: Not as bright as regular Torches.[--没有普通火把那么亮。--]
Also has another use...[--还有另一个用途...--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests7.des: Used to incubate your Moa Eggs that you have collected on your travels.[--用于灌注您在旅行中收集的恐鸟蛋。--]
Incubating the eggs will make them hatch into baby Moas.[--孵化鸡蛋可以让它们孵化成小马斯。--]
When a baby Moa is born it'll need feeding a certain food source called a &eAechor Petal&r.[--当小马哈伊出生时,它需要喂食一个叫做&eAechor Petal&r的食物.--]

When a baby Moa fully grows up after eating &ax3 &eAechor Petals&r, it'll become an adult Moa which can be ridden on provided it has a saddle equipped.[--当小马达吃下&ax3&eAechor Petals&r后完全长大时,它会变成一只成年马达,只要它装备了马鞍就可以骑骑了.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests8.des: Your travel companion awaits![--你的旅行伙伴正在等待!--]
All you need to do is incubate the egg to make it hatch or you can just simply use it to make Cakes if that's your kind of thing?![--你只需要给鸡蛋灌注,让它孵化,或者你可以直接用它做蛋糕,如果这是你喜欢的东西的话!--]
&o&7*rumours say that the black moas are the best for flying long distances...&r[--&o&7*rumours说,黑色驼鹿是长距离飞行最好的...&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests9.des: A drop from a plant called an &eAechor Plant&r.[--来自一个叫&e神秘植物&r的植物的掉落物.--]
It can also be found inside the &7Silver&r Dungeon Chests rarely, which overall is easier to find.[--它也可以在&7银&r地牢箱子中找到,这总体来说更容易找到.--]
These plants are hard to see, so be on the lookout for them.[--这些植物很难看,所以请注意它们。--]
They are also hostile and shoot Poison Darts, so be careful![--它们也是敌对的,会发射毒雾弹,所以要小心!--]
The &apetal&r that drops is used to feed baby Moas once they are hungry after being incubated.[--掉落物&ap金属&r一旦被灌注后饥饿,用于喂养小马斯.--]
If you use a Skyroot Bucket on this plant, you'll gain some poison from it in your bucket! [--如果你在这个植物上使用天根桶,你将在桶里得到一些毒液!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests10.ti: Should be in Vanilla...[--应该在原版...--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests10.de: Can be crafted with String and some Leather.[--可以使用线和皮革制作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests11.de: Obtained by defeating the Sun Spirit.[--通过击败太阳灵获得。--]
Used to open &6Gold&r Dungeon loot Chests.[--用于打开&6金&r地牢战利品箱子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests12.de: Obtained by defeating the Aerwhale King.[--通过击败Aerwake King获得。--]
Used to open &9Platinum&r Dungeon loot Chests.[--用于打开&9铂&r地牢战利品箱子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests13.de: Locate and discover a &cBronze&r Dungeon.[--找到并发现一个&c青铜&r地牢。--]
This is the easiest dungeon, that contains some great loot.[--这是最简单的地牢,包含一些很好的战利品。--]
Can be found almost anywhere in the &bAether&r.[--&b天境&r几乎可以在任何地方找到.--]
Just keep your eyes peeled for secret entrances that look like caves.[--保持你的眼皮去寻找看起来像洞穴的隐秘入口。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests14.ti: The Valkyrie Queen Awaits[--武神女王等待--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests14.de: Locate and discover a &7Silver&r Dungeon.[--找到并发现一个&7银&r地牢。--]
Be prepared for a difficult of a fight![--准备好一场坚韧的战斗吧!--]
Can be found within the skies of &bAether&r.[--可以在&bAether&r的天空中找到.--]
The structure looks like a greek ancient building with many pillars around it.[--这个结构看起来像一个古代的灰烬建筑,周围有多个柱子。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests15.ti: As hot as the Sun![--像太阳一样热!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests15.de: Locate and discover a &6Gold&r Dungeon.[--找到并发现一个&6金&r地牢。--]
If you are well prepared, this fight will be more annoying then hard...[--如果你准备好了,这场战斗会更烦人,然后更难...--]
This dungeon can be found on a floating sphere shape island that has Golden Skyroot trees growing on top of it anywhere in the &bAether&r.[--这个地牢可以在漂浮球形岛屿上找到,在&b以太&r的任何地方有金天根树生长在它上面.--]
Talk multiple times to the &4Sun Spirit&r to start the boss battle.[--与&4太阳灵&r多次交谈以开始Boss战斗.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests16.ti: Puts up an AWESOME fight![--进行AWESOME战斗!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests16.de: Locate and discover a &9Platinum&r Dungeon.[--找到并发现一个&9铂&r地牢.--]
A true final boss battle awaits, no spoilers![--真正的最终Boss战斗正在等待,没有破坏者!--]
Can be found in the highest of skies in the &bAether&r.[--可以在&b天境&r的天空中找到.--]

This dungeon has the Aerwhale King flying around a large tower in the sky, by \"Right Clicking\" the &3Songstone&r it'll start the Boss battle.[--这个地牢让Aerwhele King在天空中的大塔周围飞行,通过“右键单击”&3烟雾&r它会开始Boss战斗.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests17.de: Can be obtained by using a Gravitite Axe on a Amber Skyroot Logs.[--可以通过在琥珀天根原木上使用重力晶斧获得。--]
Used for crafting Golden Dart Shooter, Golden Darts.[--&2用于制作黄金飞镖,黄金飞镖。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests18.de: Obtained by defeating the Valkyrie Queen.[--通过击败武神女王获得。--]
Used to open &7Silver&r Dungeon loot Chests.[--用于打开&7银&r地牢战利品箱子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests19.de: Obtained by defeating the Silder.[--通过击败粉碎机获得。--]
Used to open &cBronze&r Dungeon loot Chests.[--用于打开&c青铜&r地牢战利品箱子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests20.de: Freezes items of course![--当然会冻结物品!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests21.de: The Altar is \"&m&7kinda&r\" like a Furnace.[--祭坛像熔炉一样是&m&7kinda&r.--]
You can cook Aerclouds to change them, repair damaged equipment, enchant certain items and create...&o&7new Music Discs?![--你可以烹饪Aerclouds来更改它们,修复被破坏的设备,附魔某些物品并制作...&o&7新的音乐唱片?--]
&eAmbrosium&r is the main fuel source.[--&eAmbrosium&r是主要燃料来源.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests22.de: Used to control the time of day.[--用于控制白天的时间.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests23.ti: I'm blue, daba dee dab a die..[--我是蓝色的,Daba Dee Dab a die...--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests23.de: Pretty much on par with the Sweetberries in the Overworld.[--与主世界的甜浆果差不多。--]
Harvest the bushes to gather the berries.[--收获灌木来收集浆果。--]
Break the bushes to move and replant them.[--破坏灌木丛来移动并重新种植它们。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests24.de: A &a&nHUGE&r upgrade to the Blue Berry.[--&a&nHUGE&r升级到蓝色浆果.--]
Can be created using an Alter, extremely great food source.[--可以通过一个非常棒的食物源来制作。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests25.de: Not to be mistaken for a food source.[--不要为食物来源错误。--]
White Apples can be obtained by breaking Crystal Fruit Leaves, these leaves are blue in colour with white dots on them.[--破坏水晶果树叶可以获取白苹果,这些树叶颜色是蓝色的,上面有白色圆点.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests26.de: Used in many recipes including tools, weapons, armour etc...[--用于许多配方,包括工具、武器、护甲等等......--]
It is also needed for crafting an Altar.[--制作祭坛还需要它。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests27.de: Used to craft the Freezer.[--用于制作冷冻机。--]
&7&o*totally doesn't look like a blue version of Glowstone, no no...&r[--&7&o* 看起来像不是荧石的蓝色版本,没有...&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests29.de: Can be obtained by slaying those unbelievably cute tiny little bunnies that you can find hoping around peacefully.[--通过杀死那些你和平地找到的令人无法相信的可爱小兔(小兔)来获得。--]
Rumour has it, you can also get those bunnies to sit on your head...[--有传言说,你还可以让那些小兔子坐到你头上......--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests30.de: The Cobblestone of the &bAether&r...[--&b天境&r的圆石......--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests31.ti: What goes up, must...[--增加什么,必须......--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests31.de: The diamond rarity of the &bAether&r.[--&b天境&r的钻石稀有度.--]
This block has a very unique property as when it has no block above it, it'll just simply float up until it touches another block.[--这个方块有一个非常独特的属性,因为当它上面没有方块的时候,它只需要漂浮起来,直到它触及另一个方块.--]
Thus meaning you can lose this block in the sky if you are not careful![--因此,如果你不小心,你就可以在空中丢失这个方块!--]
&o&7*the name of the ore kind of gives that away...[--&o&7*这种矿石的名称会告诉你...--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests32.de: Created by freezing Skyroot Water Buckets.[--由冷冻天根水桶创建。--]
&o&7*don't worry you keep the bucket!&r[--&o&7* 别怕你拿着桶!&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests33.de: This is one &6&nVERY&r precious gem![--这是一块&6&nVerY&r宝石!--]
It is, as they would say...\" hard-locked\" or is it the term \"gated\"?[--这是, 正如他们所说的... 硬锁了”还是“Gated”这个词?--]
In other words, you'll need to go back and defeat the &3Aerwhale King &eBoss&r to obtain this gem, it's a drop from defeating it![--换句话说,你需要返回并击败&3空影王&eBoss&r来获得这个宝石,这是击败它的一个掉落物!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests34.de: This is a &n&eMUST HAVE&r Weapon for the early game bosses.[--这是&n&eMust hav&r给早期Boss的武器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests35.ti: But you still need to craft it?![--但是,你还需要制作它吗?!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests35.de: Days in the Aether are &ax3&r longer than the Overworld day cycle.[--天境中的天比主世界白天更长&ax3&r.--]
You might be a wise idea to craft a Skyroot Bed to set your spawn...[--制作天根木床来设置你的出生点,你可能是一个智能的灵感。。。。。。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests36.ti: Hot to the Touch![--热到触摸!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests37.de: A rare find in the &6Gold&r Dungeon loot Chest.[--&6金&r地牢战利品箱中罕见的发现。--]
Upon consuming, you'll recieve some extra hearts.[--消耗后,你会收集一些额外的心。--]
A Total of &ax5&r Life Shards can be Consumed.[--总共可以消耗&ax5&r生命碎片.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests38.su: The sky is the limit[--天空是极限--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests38.de: &6The Aether&r centers around a dimension high in the sky, filled with vast skylands of clouds and floating islands.[--&6以太&r围绕天空中的维度,充满了巨大的云和漂浮岛屿。--]

This dimension features its own new survival adventure, based around a basic vanilla-esque survival progression that features new ores, mythical mobs, and three perilous dungeons each with their own powerful loot items.[--这个维度决定了它自己的新的生存冒险,它基于一个基础的原版-esque survey procenting,其中包含了新的矿石、神话生物和3个危险地牢,每个地牢都有它们自己的强力战利品.--]

You can make a portal to the &6The Aether&r by making portal with the same format as nether portal instead you use &cglowstone blocks&r, and &nuse water bucket to activate it&r.[--你可以制作一个前往&6以太&r的传送门,其格式与下界传送门相同,而不是使用&c荧石块&r,并且&n使用水桶激活它&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether.quests39.de: Your Overworldly tools have no power here.[--你主世界的工具在这里没有电力.--]
You'll want to quickly make a new pickaxe from the woods around you if you want to get anywhere in The Aether.[--如果你想在天境中找到任何地方,你就会想从周围的森林里快速制作新的镐子。--]
Trinkets and Accessories can be obtained from beating bosses within the &bAether&r dimension.[--饰品和饰品可以通过&b天境&r维度内的击败Boss获得.--]

Simply press \"&ee&r\" to open up your inventory, look at the left of your charaters feet and click on the cloud icon to access a new inventory screen to equip them.[--只需按下“&e&r”键打开你的库存,查看你的chraters脚的左侧,并点击云图以访问新的库存屏幕来装备它们.--]
Any armour set bonuses require the glove type also.[--任意盔甲套装奖励都需要手套类型.--]
The &6Book Of Lore&r is the &bAether&r explorers dream.[--&6爱之书&r是&b以太&r探险家的梦。--]
Think of it as a wiki for &2ALL&r the new &bAether&r items/blocks gathered.[--把它当做&2Aether&r的wiki来收集新的&bAether&r物品/方块.--]
Simply open it up and add an item/block in the slot in the book to find out more information.[--只需打开它,在书中的插槽中添加一个物品/方块来获取更多信息。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_black_market.title: &0&l The Black Market[--&0&l黑市--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_black_market.quest: Mytical Forest Ravager[--神秘森林劫掠者--]
Red double zinc saber[--红色双层锌剑--]
changing the saber color loses the effects.[--改变剑颜色会丢失效果.--]
changing the saber color loses the effects.[--改变剑颜色会丢失效果.--]
it comes with ice damage, and changing the saber color loses the effects.[--它有冰的伤害,而改变剑的颜色会失去效果.--]
Infinity Range Booster[--无限范围升级--]
it comes with fire damage, and changing the saber color loses the effects.[--它具有火焰伤害,而改变剑颜色会失去效果。--]
Black Brass Saber[--黑色黄铜军刀--]
changing the saber color loses the effects.[--改变剑颜色会丢失效果.--]
Lime Brass Saber[--黄绿色黄铜军刀--]

The most overpowered item ever made in a survival world, having completed all that the pack has to offer, right? So, claim your overpowered item for all the hard work. Congratulations![--在生存世界中最强力的物品,已经完成任务包提供的所有物品了,对吗?所以,为你的所有辛劳工作认领你的物品。恭喜!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.title: &eThe End[--&e末地--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.subtit: Found in Buried Chests[--在安尸箱中发现--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests0.descri: Pirates say it gave sight to the legendary Black Pearl[--海盗说它让传说中的黑珍珠看见它了--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests1.descri: One of the last artifacts left behind by the Iceologers before they all suddenly vanished from the world[--冰术师留下的遗物之一,在他们从世界中突然消失之前--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests2.subtit: Found in Pillager Outposts[--在掠夺者前哨站中找到--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests2.descri: The eye of a greedy king faded in solitude. Legend says it will bring infinite fortune to its owner[--一个贪婪的国王的眼在寂静中消逝。传说它会给它的主人带来无限的命运--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests3.subtit: Found in Mineshafts[--在矿井中发现--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests3.descri: It is told that it was forged by the first blacksmiths of time[--它说它是由时间的第一个铁匠合成的--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests4.title: Nether Eye[--下界之眼--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests4.subtit: Found in Nether Fortresses[--在下界要塞中发现--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests4.descri: It was lost by a demon in the battle between the Aether and the Nether[--它被恶魔在以太和下界的战斗中丢失了--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests5.subtit: Found in Desert Pyramids[--在沙漠金字塔中发现--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests5.descri: Legends say this eye once belonged to one of the great Sandworms[--传说这只眼睛曾经是大沙子之一的--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests6.subtit: Found in Jungle Pyramids[--在丛林木斜板中发现--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests6.descri: This eye is believed to have given our ancestors the knowledge of Redstone[--相信这只眼已经给了我们的长者有关红石的知识--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests7.subtit: Found in Bastions treasure chest[--在堡垒宝箱中找到--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests7.descri: A powerful yet destructive artifact; the Piglins swore to protect it at the cost of their lives[--一种强大而具有破坏力的神器;猪灵们发过誓要保护它,以他们的生命为代价--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests8.subtit: Buy it from a master cleric[--从主牧师那里购买它--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests8.descri: A holy talisman said to protect its owner from bad luck[--一个神圣的护身符说,它会保护它的主人免受霉运--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests9.subtit: Get it by Killing Elder Guardian[--通过杀死远古守卫获得--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests9.descri: It has seen many warriors drown into the depths of the sea[--它看到许多战士沉没在深海中--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests10.subti: Dropped by Evokers[--由唤魔者掉落--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests10.descr: Without this eye, the Evoker has no power[--没有这只眼,唤魔者没有力量--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests11.subti: Dropped by The Wither[--凋零掉落物--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests11.descr: Has witnessed destruction. Maybe it also witnessed your stuff disappear[--已经看到破坏。也许它也看见你的东西消失--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests12.subti: Craft it using the witch pupil[--用巫师徒制作它--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests12.descr: This pupil is believed to have seen the ancient brewing recipes that were lost in time.[--这个市民相信已经看到古老的酿造配方,这些配方在时间上丢失了。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests13.subti: Craft it using an Undead Soul[--用亡灵灵魂制作它--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests13.descr: Remembrance of the past lives of those who live in death[--纪念死亡者过去的生活--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests14.subti: Craft it using aquatic items[--使用水生物品制作它--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests14.descr: Those who followed this eye were never seen again; rumors say they found the great city of Atlantis, or lost their way trying[--跟随这只眼睛的人再没有看到过;传言说他们找到了阿特兰蒂斯的伟大城市,或迷失了自己的尝试--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests15.subti: ave a small chance to get it when enchanting[--&2附魔时有小几率获得它--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests15.descr: No information about this eye[--没有关于这只眼的信息--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests16.title: &eAbout the end&f[--&e末地&f--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests16.descr: There is a total of 16 custom eyes you can find by exploring vanilla structures and fighting vanilla bosses. [--通过探索原版结构与与原版Boss战斗,你可以找到总共16只自定义的眼。--]
&6Once you have at least 12 eyes&r you can follow them until you reach the Stronghold. [--&6当你至少有12只眼&r时,你可以跟随它们,直到你到达要塞。--]
Right click to throw them in the sky. They will point in the direction of the closest End Portal.[--右键单击将其扔入天空。它们将指向最近的末地传送门的方向。--]

Make your way to the Stronghold, find the End Portal and complete the frame using the 12 custom eyes in order to open it. If there's a vanilla eye of ender in one of the frames, you can remove it by right clicking on it with a custom eye.[--前往要塞,找到末地传送门,使用12只自定义眼睛来完成框架以打开它。如果一个框架有末影的原版之眼,你可以用自定义眼睛右键单击它来移除它。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.title: Enter &ethe end&f[--进入&e末地&f--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.subti: It is time to face the mighty Ender Dragon[--是时候面对强大的末影龙了--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_end.quests17.descr: In &eThe End&r, you'll find the final boss of Vanilla Minecraft: The &5Ender Dragon&r.[--在&e末地&r中,你会找到原版Minecraft的最后一个Boss:&5末影龙&r.--]

At the top of each pillar of Obsidian, you'll find an End Crystal that heals the Dragon. Make sure to take those out first! They also do a lot of damage, so make sure to create some distance![--在黑石的每个柱子顶部,你会找到一个治疗龙的末影水晶。确保先把那些水晶取出来!它们也会造成大量的伤害,所以确保制造一些距离!--]
Once defeated, a &dDragon Egg&r spawns at the top of the Exit Portal. This cannot be mined like normal blocks, but is affected by gravity. :)[--击败后,&d龙蛋&r会生成在退出传送门的顶部。这不能像普通方块一样开采,但受重力影响。)--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.title: &2The Twilight Forest[--&2暮色森林--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests0.t: Enter &2The Twilight Forest[--进入&2暮色森林--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests0.d: Twilight forest is a mod thats centered in another dimension called the Twilight Forest. It has it's own progression system, and it starts by visiting the twilight forest dimension! [--暮色森林是一个mod,以另一个维度为中心,叫做暮色森林。它拥有自己的进化系统,它从访问暮色森林维度开始!--]

You can make a portal to the Twilight Forest by making a 2x2 hole in the ground, filling it with water, and surrounding it with flowers. Once that's done. Throw a single diamond into the water, and lightning will strike it, opening the portal to the Twilight Forest.[--你可以通过在地上做一个2x2洞来制作通向暮色森林的传送门,用水填满,然后用花来环绕它。完成后,将钻石扔进水中,闪电会击中它,打开通向暮色森林的传送门。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests0.t: Enter the Twilight Forest[--进入暮色森林--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests1.t: Map of the Forest[--森林地图--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests1.d: The Blank magic map can be used similar to a normal map, but inside the twilight forest it will show all the nearby biomes and objectives in said biome. It's very usefull for finding your way around.[--空白魔法地图可以像普通地图一样使用,但是在暮色森林中,它将显示上面描述的生物群系中的所有附近的生物群系和目标。对于找到周围的方向很有用。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests2.s: Found in forests. Unlocks the &eLich Tower&r.[--在森林中找到。解锁&eLich Tawer&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests2.d: Your first &ctarget&r is the &aNaga&r, which lives in the &ecourtyard of the forest&r. [--第一个&c目标&r是&a娜迦&r,它生活在&e森林庭院&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests3.t: Defeat the &eTwilight Lich[--击败&e暮色巫妖--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests3.s: Found in forests. Unlocks Labyrinths and Yeti Lairs.[--在森林中找到。解锁迷宫和雪怪巢穴。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests3.d: Atop the &egrand tower&r is the &cLich&r. While shielded &ehe is unable to be damaged&r, however his &bown attacks may be lethal to him&r.[--Atop&egrand Tall&r是&cLich&r。当被盾牌&e他无法被破坏&r时,他&b棕色攻击可能会杀死他&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests4.s: Found in Hollow Hills in swamps. Unlocks The Dark Forest.[--在沼泽中的空心丘陵中找到。解锁黑暗森林。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests4.d: With the &aMeef Stroganoff&r protecting you from the &cheat&r of the &4Fire Swamp&r, it's time to venture in and slay the next beast on your journey: &bThe Hydra&r.[--有了&aMeef Stroganoff&r来保护你免受&4火之沼&r的&c热量&r,是时候冒险在你的旅途中杀死下一个野兽了:&b九头蛇&r.--]

&bThe Hydra&r is very tanky and can deal a lot of damage, so it's best to be &every prepared for this fight&r. Perhaps &dthe defenses in its mouth are lower than the rest of its body&r?[--&b九头蛇&r非常坚毅,可以造成大量的伤害,所以最好&e为这场战斗&r做好准备。也许&d它口中的防御比它其他的体形要低&r?--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests5.s: Found in Dark Towers in The Dark Forest.[--在黑暗森林的黑暗塔中找到。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests5.d: Ascend the grand tower to confront the &cUr-Ghast&r. To aid in defeating it, use the &eGhast Traps&r to pull the &cUr-Ghast&r out of the sky allowing you to do &elots of damage to it&r. [--加速巨型塔以直面&c暮色恶魂&r。为了帮助击败它,请使用&e恶魂陷阱&r将&c恶魂&r从空中拉出,允许你做&e对它造成伤害的eelts&r.--]
Watch out for the &cUr-Ghast&r's tears, as they will do &dsignificant damage to you&r![--注意&c暮色恶魂&r的泪水,因为它们会对你&r造成&d巨大的伤害!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests6.t: Defeat the &f&lAlpha Yeti[--击败&f&l雪怪首领--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests6.s: Found in &fYeti Lairs &rin the &fSnowy Forest&r. Unlocks the &f&lSnow Queen&r.[--在&fYeti Lairs&r&f雪地森林&r中找到。解锁&f&l雪地女王&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests6.d: Deep in the &bSnowy Forest&r you will find the &aLair of the Yeti&r. &aYetis&r can pick you up and throw you to deal significant damage, but the &eFur of the Alpha Yeti&r will be required to advanced into the &3glacial area&r of the &bSnowy Forest&r.[--在&b雪地森林&r深处,你会发现&a雪地之线&r.&aYetis&r可以捡起你并扔给你造成大量伤害,但&e雪地首领之箭&r需要进入&b雪地森林&r的&3岩浆区域&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests6.t: Defeat the Alpha Yeti[--击败雪怪首领--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests7.s: Found in Glaciers.[--在冰川中找到。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests7.d: Ascend the &bGlacial Peaks&r to find the &aAurora Palace&r the lair of the &eSnow Queen&r. She awaits you at the &2highest point&r.[--升级&b冰川山峰&r以找到&a灵气宫殿&r&e雪女王巢穴&r.在&2最高点&r等待你.--]

Once you find her, she is &eheavily protected&r by the &bice of her throne&r. You will need to wait for her to lower herself into attack range to defeat her.[--一旦你找到它,它会被王位&b冰保护&r.你需要等待它降级到攻击范围才能击败它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests8.s: Obtained by killing a Minotaur, found in swamp Labyrinths. Unlocks Hollow Hills.[--杀死在沼泽迷宫中找到的牛头人获得。解锁空心丘陵。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests8.d: In the &aswamp&r you will find a mound that will lead you down into a &blabyrinth&r. Traverse these dark corridors and &cslay&r the &eMinoshroom&r for your reward.[--在&aswamp&r中,你会发现一个modd会将你带入&blabyrinth&r。通过这些黑暗的通道和&cslay&r&e米诺菇&r来获得奖励.--]

You're looking to get your hands on some &dMeef Stroganaff&r. Consuming this will allow you to traverse deeper into the hotter part of the swamp and fight the &6Hydra&r![--你正在寻找一些&dMeef Stroganaff&r. 消耗它可以让你更深的探索沼泽,并和&6Hydra&r战斗!--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests9.t: Defeat Knight Phantom[--击败幻影骑士--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests9.s: Found in Dark Towers in The Dark Forest.[--在黑暗森林的黑暗塔中找到。--]
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight.quests9.d: The &cCarmintine&r contraptions of the &eUr-Ghast Tower&r will not obey you. You must &aearn the ability to control them&r. Travel into the &2Dark Forest&r and find a dungeon slightly exposed from the ground. Place a &3Trophy&r of a defeated boss on the pedestal to enter.[--&c石灰石塔&r的装置不会顺从你.你必须&a提高控制它们的能力&r.前往&2深色森林&r,从地面上发现一个地牢。在基座上放置一个被击败的Boss的&3Trophy&r来进入.--]
Deep inside you will find the &dKnight Phantom&r. Defeating him will grant you access to control the &cCarmintine&r contraptions.[--在深暗的深处,你会发现&dKnight Phantom&r.击败他将允许你控制&c金晶&r装置.--]
Once you have successfully slain &bThe Hydra&r, &cThe Ur-Ghast&r, and &aThe Snow Queen&r, the &eacid rains&r of the &dHighlands&r will cease, allowing you to finally enter. [--一旦你成功杀死&b九头蛇&r、&c余烬恶魂&r和&a冰雪女王&r,&e高地&r的&e英安之雨&r将停止,允许你最终进入.--]

Your first goal is to locate a &2cave full of trolls&r. &3Trolls&r hide their most valuable possessions in stashes made of &dobsidian&r. The large stash you will not be able to get into until later, but remember it's location as you will return soon. In the smaller stashes, you can find &aMagic Beans&r. [--你的第一个目标就是找到一个&2装满巨魔&r的宝箱&3卷轴&r,&3卷轴&r将其最有用的物品隐藏在&d黑石&r的宝藏中。你稍后才能进入大宝藏,但记住它的位置,因为你即将返回。在小型宝藏中,你可以找到&a魔法豆&r。这些豆子可以种植在地表&d紫色泥土&r上,以在空中种植一个&a大型的豆茎&r.--]
Using the &abeanstalk&r to ascend to the heavens, you find a cloud populated by &bGiants&r. Slay these &bGiants&r for their oversized tools, in particular the &eGiant's Pickaxe&r.[--使用&abeantestato&r向上爬上天空,你找到一个由&bGiants&r聚集的云。杀死这些&bGiants&r来获得他们的超大工具,特别是&eGiant的镐&r.--]
Once you have the &eGiant's Pickaxe&r in hand, descend back into the &2Troll Cave&r to &3break into the giant &dObsidian&3 vault&r.[--一旦你手持&eGiant的镐&r,就会返回&2卷轴洞&r来&3破坏巨型&d黑石&3保险库&r.--]
Inside the &2Giant&r's &dObsidian&r vault you will find &eThe Lamp of Cinders&r, which has the power to burn away the pesky &cthorns&r in the &dHighlands&r.[--在&2巨人&r的&d黑石&r金库中,你会发现&e余烬之灯&r,它有力量在&d高空&r中烧掉&c角&r.--]

Use it to ascend to the &5Final Castle&r. You can hold right-click to spread the flame in an AoE around you, or apply directly to the &cthorns&r with right-click.[--使用它来升到&5终极城堡&r.你可以按住右键在AoE周围放置火焰,或者用右键直接应用于&c角头&r.--]
